GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1_0: evaṃ tāvat prathame vimarśe dhvanilakṣaṇaṃ dūṣayitvā dhvaniśāstragataṃ granthāntaraṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1_1: dūṣayituṃ sāmānyena tāvat kāvyagatam anaucityollāsarūpaṃ dūṣaṇaprapañcam upapādayitum
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:1_2: āha - iha khalv ityādinā / uktam iti sahṛdayaiḥ / antaraṅgam iti sākṣād rasaviṣayatvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:4_0: ityādinā / bahiraṅgam iti vācyamukhena rase paryavasānād vidheyaḥ prādhānyena pratipipādayiṣito
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:4_1: yo 'rthas tasya avimarśo 'nanusaṃdhānam upasarjanīkaraṇāt / prakramaḥ kasya cid vastuno
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:4_2: nirvāhāyārambhas tasya bhedo madhye 'nyathīkaraṇam anyathānirvāhaś ca / kramasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:4_3: paripāṭyā bheda ullaṅghanaṃ vyutkrama iti yāvat / paunaruktyaṃ punaḥpratipādanam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:4_4: vācyasya vaktavyasya avacanam anuktiḥ / etā avāntarabhedabhinnāḥ pañca dūṣanajātayaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:5_0: yad etad ihagranthakṛtā vicārasaraṇim āśritya vidheyāvimarśādidoṣapañcakam udbhāvitaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:5_2: vicārasya praṇītatvāt / tathā hi / dāsyāḥ putra ityādāv ākrośe ṣaṣṭhyā alukaṃ pratipādayatā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:5_3: sūtrakṛtā vidheyāvimarśaḥ sūcita eva / tathā svāmīśvarādhipatidāyādety atra sūtre
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:5_4: na hi bhavati gavāṃ svāmī aśveṣu ca iti vadatā bhāṣyakṛtā spaṣṭam eva prakramabhedaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:5_5: pratipāditaḥ / tathā kṛñcānuprayujyate liṭi iy atrānuprayogasyānuśabdaparyālocanayā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:5_6: vyavahitapūrvaprayogaṃ taṃ pātayāṃ prathamam āsa ityādau niṣedhatā cādīnāṃ ca na
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:5_7: hi bhavati ca vṛkṣaḥ ityādinā prayoganiyamakhyāpanena dyotakatvaṃ kathayatā asthānaprayogalakṣaṇaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:5_8: kramabhedaḥ kaṭākṣita eva / tathā karmadhārayamatvarthīyābhyāṃ bahuvrīhir laghutvāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:5_9: syād iti vṛttilāghavaṃ cintayatā kātyāyanena paunaruktyam api prakāśitam eva / tathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:5_10: īṣad asamāptau ity atra pratijñānasamadhigamyaṃ sūtrakāroktaṃ rūpakalakṣaṇam arthaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:5_12: upamāṃ vyavasthāpayatopamāśrayeṇa vācyāvacanam api dyotitam eva / etena rūpakāśrayeṇāvācyavacanam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:5_13: api dyotitam eva / tad evaṃ mahāviduṣāṃ mārgam anusṛtya sahṛdayaśikṣādarāya vicārayandaraṃto
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:5_14: 'sya mahāmater na kaś cit paryanuyogaleśasyāpy avasara ity alam atiprasaṅgena /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:6_0: etasya ceti sāmānyenānaucityasya / doṣā iti kāvyasya vikṛtatvāpādanād dūṣaṇād doṣā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:6_1: iti / mugdha iti pṛṣṭasyāprativikṛtatve trīṇi kāraṇāni / prativacanāpratibhānalakṣaṇaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:6_2: maugdhyaṃ pratibhāne 'py aprauḍharūpatvam asahyatvam / prauḍhatve 'pi guṇāsahiṣṇutvalakṣaṇaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:6_3: mātsaryam / tāny atra saṃdihyamānatayā krameṇoktāni / yaḥ kilety atraiva cchedaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:6_4: chātrābhyarthanayeti praṣṭṛtvasyāṅgīkṛtam iti prativaktṛtvasya ca nirdeśaḥ / paurobhāgyaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:6_5: doṣaikagrāhitvam / nanu yadi parakīye kāvye parihārāya doṣāṇāṃ vicāraḥ kriyate, tat
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:6_6: kiṃ nijakāvye na teṣāṃ parihāraḥ / tathā ca bhajate mātsaryamaunaṃ nu kim ity ato
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:6_7: 'nantaram iti pṛṣṭa ity evaṃ krameṇetiśabdo nirdeśyaḥ kramāntareṇa nirdeśāt kramabhedo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:6_8: na yujyate / evam anyat śokāpadānādau jñeyam / tadartham āha - svakṛtiṣv iti kṛtiḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:7_0: saṃrambha iti kutsitāḥ kariṇaḥ karikīṭāḥ kutsitāni kutsanaiḥ iti samāsaḥ / karikīṭānām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:7_1: āśādviradaiḥ pratinirdeśaḥ / meghaśakalānāṃ tu kalpāntatoyadaiḥ ya ity atraiva cchedaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:7_2: ayaṃ śloko vakroktijīvite vitatya vyākhyāta iti tata evāvadhāryaḥ / tāvacchabdo vidheyāvimarśatrayasyaitacchlokagatasyopakramadyotakaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:7_3: saṃbandhopapatter iti / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - samarthaḥ padavidhiḥ iti vacanāt samāsaḥ sāmarthyanimittakaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:7_4: sāmarthyaṃ ca saṅgatārthatvaṃ, saṅgatatvaṃ ca saṃbandhaḥ / sa cātra viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:7_5: paryudāsasyaiva viśeṣaṇaṃ nañā abrāhmaṇa iti yathā / na cātra vakṣyamāṇanyāyena paryudāso
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:7_6: ghaṭata iti / nanv abrāhmaṇa ityādau nañ kathaṃ viśeṣaṇam / viśeṣaṇaṃ hi viśeṣyasyoparañjakaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:7_7: bhavati / na ca nañśabdo viruddhatvād vidhim uparañjayati / tat katham asya viśeṣaṇatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:7_8: naitat / abrāhmaṇa ityādau brāhmaṇaśabdo brāhmaṇasadṛśe kṣatriyādau vartate / sā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:7_9: cākṣatriyādau brāhmaṇaśabdasya vṛttir nañā dyotyate / tad uktam - nañ ivayuktam anyasadṛśādhikaraṇe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:7_10: tatha hy artha iti / tatra ca śabdaśaktisvābhāvyaṃ kāraṇam / yathā caitat tathā nañsūtrabhāṣyād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_0: pradhānatvam iti / yatra vidheḥ prādhānyaṃ pratiṣedhasyāprādhānyaṃ naña uttarapadena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_1: saṃbandhaḥ samarthasamāsa ekavākyatvaṃ ca tatra paryudāsaḥ kiṃ cid varjayitvā kasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_2: cid upadeśo nirāsa iti nigamanāt / tatra kārikāyāṃ trayaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ dvayaṃ cākṣipyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_3: jugopeti / atra nañarthaviśiṣṭasyottarapadārthasya vidhir na trastatvādiniṣedhaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_4: tatrāpy atrastatvādeḥ siddhatvāt tadanuvādena gopanādi vidhīyata iti paryudāsatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_5: aprādhānyam iti / yatra pratiṣedhasya prādhānyaṃ vidher aprādhānyyaṃ nañaḥ kriyāpadena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_6: saṃbandho 'samarthasamāsaḥ vākyabhedaś ca, tatra prasajya prāpayya pratiṣedha iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_7: prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ / atra kārikāyāṃ traye nirdiṣṭe 'nyad dvayam ākṣiptam / na veti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_8: atra dṛptaniśācaraṃ prati niṣedhaḥ pratīyate, na tv adṛptaniśācaravidhir iti prasajyapratiṣedhatā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_9: saṃrambhavatpratiṣedho hy atreti / saṃrabdhavān yaḥ puruṣas tadgatā yeyaṃ saṃrabdhatā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_10: saṃrambhaṇakriyā tasyā vakṣyamāṇanyāyena pratiṣedha ity arthaḥ / asaṃradhavadvidhir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_11: iti saṃrabdhavatsadṛśasya saṃrambhasadṛśakriyākarttur udāsīnaprāyasya vidhir ity
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_12: arthaḥ / yad uktaṃ nañ iva yuktam ityādi / tatreti saṃrabdahavatpratiṣedhe / na cāsāv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_13: iti pratiṣedhati / tatsiddhipakṣa iti vivakṣito yaḥ pradhānabhūtaniṣedhalakṣaṇo 'rthasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_14: siddhipakṣa ity arthaḥ / asya vidhyanuvādabhāvasyeti / nañarthasya vidhir uttarapadārthasyānuvāda
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_15: ity asya / samāse hi nañarthopasarjana uttarapadārthaḥ prādhānyena pratīyate / kāvyārtheti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:8_16: atra vyavacchedyaṃ prasajyapratiṣedhaṃ pradarśya paricchedyaṃ paryudāsam udāharati /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:9_0: nanu prasajyapratiṣedhe nañaḥ kriyānvaye 'saṃrabdahavān ity atra saṃrambhakriyāniṣedho
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:9_1: bhaviṣyati / tat ko 'tra doṣa ity āha: kriyākartraṃśabhāg iti / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ: asaṃrabdhavān
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:9_2: ity atra dvāv aṃśau kriyāṃśaḥ kārakāṃśaś ca / tatrobhayāṃśabhāgarthaniṣedhe śabdaśaktisvābhāvyād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:9_3: vākye kriyāṃśaniṣedhas tasya prādhānyena vivakṣitasyāparāmarśam anuktād vidheyāvimarśaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:9_4: yathā ca prasajyapratiṣedhe samāso neṣṭas tathoktanayena paryudāse 'py asamāso neṣyata
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:9_5: ity āha - nanu sādhv iti atra na kurvateti karaṇakriyākartṛsadṛśena kriyāṃ praty
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:9_6: udāsīnaprāyeṇety arthaḥ / akurvateti vācye na kurvateti kriyāṃśaniṣedhaḥ pratīter
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:9_7: vaiparītyakārī / evaṃ nocitam apīty ucitatvamātraniṣedhaḥ pratīter vaiparītyakṛd
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:9_8: eva / tacchravaṇaṃ kriyāśravaṇam / tayor iti siddhārthā vṛttiḥ / sādhyārthaṃ vākyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:9_9: asūryaṃpaśyādiṣv iti / atrāpi nañaḥ sūryeṇottarpadārthena nābhisaṃbandhaḥ, api tu
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:9_10: taddraṣṭrarthenaiva / tatrāpi kartraṃśaḥ pradhānaṃ na kriyāṃśaḥ karttari khaśo vidhānād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:9_11: iti pūrvavad avaseyam / bhuṅkta iti atra hi vākyasya kriyāprādhānyaṃ pratīyamānabhavatyādikriyāpekṣe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:9_12: nañaḥ samanvaye śrāddhabhojī na bhavatīti vākyārthaḥ / aśrāddhabhojīty atra tu nañā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:9_13: bhoktus samanvaye śrāddhabhoktṛvyatirikto 'pi vighasāśyā+i++ pratīyate / yataś cātrāśrāddhabhojītyādau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:9_14: samāse pratiṣedho neṣṭaḥ, tata eva samarthasamāsas tadviparyayeṇāsamarthasamāsaś
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:9_15: ca kārikādvayenoktaḥ / vākyabhedābhedayos tu sāmarthyāt pratītir ity avacanam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:10_0: evakemaṃ vidheyāvimarśaṃ vicārya dvitīyam udāharati - yo 'sāv ity atreti tacchabdaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:10_1: praty ākāṅkṣāyāḥ kenāpy anivarttanāt / ekatareti kvacid yacchabdenopakrame tacchabdenopasaṃhāraḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:10_2: kva cit tacchabdenopakrame yacchabdenopasaṃhāraḥ prasajyate / etac ca dvayaṃ śābdopakramopasaṃhārakrameṇodāhariṣyati /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:10_3: tayor apīti / apiśabdo nañarthaṃ samuccinoti / prasajyapratiṣedhe hi nañartho vidheyo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:10_4: niṣedhyo 'rtho 'nuvādyaḥ / paryudāse tu viparyaya ity uktaṃ prāg / anuvādyavidheyeti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:10_6: vidheyaviṣayatvam / nityatvād iti / apekṣāprāṇatayāvasthānāt / śābda iti śabdenobhayoḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:10_7: saṃsparśād / ubhayoḥ saṃsparśābhāva ārthatvam / tatra dvayī gatiḥ - anyatarānupādānaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:10_8: dvayor anupādānaṃ vā / anyatarānupādanam api yattadāśrayabhāvena dvidhā / krameṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:10_9: caitad udāhariṣyati / upakalpito nityasāpekṣatvād upasthāpitaḥ / atra ca prasiddhādiviṣayatvaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:10_10: yadā nirdiṣṭam / sā kalā yā prasiddheti sphuṭatvena pratīteḥ / kva cit tado 'pi vyapadiśyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:10_11: tasya yacchabdenaikaviṣayatvāt / te iti ye mayaivānubhūte ity arthaḥ / anviyeṣa sa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:10_12: iti / atra sa iti yaḥ prakrānta ity arthaḥ / upāttavastv iti vakṣyamāṇaśloke ko 'pīti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:10_13: yad upāttaṃ vastu tadviṣayatvenety arthaḥ / asya upakramopasaṃhārasya prakrāntavastuviṣayasya /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_0: tacchabdāt prayogātiprasaṅganiyamaṃ prakāśayan parihāryaṃ viṣayaṃ pradarśayati /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_1: - yas tv ekavākya iti / ekavākyagrahaṇena parāmamṛśyasya pratyakṣāyamāṇatoktā / tataś
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_2: ca vākyabhede na doṣaḥ / kartṛtveneti prādhānyaṃ sūcayati aprādhānyasya parāmarśo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_3: na duṣyatīti khyāpanārtham / sa ity arthaḥ parāmṛṣṭaḥ / tebhya iti kartṛtvavācakād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_4: idamādibhyaś ca / asau tacchabdaḥ / asamanvayād iti tacchabdasya parokṣārthapratipādakatve
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_5: saṃbandhavirodhād ity arthaḥ / tādātmyāyeti / śaśikalāmaulisvarūpatvāyety arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_6: ārtha iti upakramopasaṃhārakramā nirdiṣṭaḥ / kalpitatatkramādīti / kalpitaṃ tad yac
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_7: chabdanirdiṣṭaṃ karmādi viṣayo 'syeti yacchabdārthaḥ karmakaraṇāditayā viṣayatvenāsya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_8: kalpita ity arthaḥ / saṃbandhadvaividhyeti śābdārthabhedena dvaividhyam / yattad
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_9: iti / yacchabdasamīpe samānādhikaraṇas tacchabda upādīyamānaḥ śabdaśaktisvābhāvyāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_10: prasiddhavastuviṣayaṃ yacchabam ākāṅkṣati / vaiyadhikaraṇyena vyavadhānena ca nirdeśe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_11: tu nirdiṣṭenaiva yadā samanvayaṃ bhajate / na kevalaṃ yo mahato 'pabhāṣate, śṛṇoti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_12: tasmād api yaḥ sa pāpabhāg ity atra yady api yaḥ sa iti yattador nairantaryeṇa sāmānādhikaraṇyena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_13: ca nirdeśaḥ, tathāpi na yat tad ūrjitam iti nyāyena tacchabdo yacchabdāntaraṃ praty
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_14: apekṣāyām iha yadi tacchabdo nirantaropāttayacchabdāpekṣayaiva prayujyate, tadā syād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_15: eṣa doṣaḥ, yāvatā na kevalaṃ ya ity atra yacchabdāpekṣayā vyavadhānena prādhānyāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_17: pūrvasaṃskāreṇa na tacchabdāntaram ākāṅkṣatīty anavadyam etat / tad itthaṃ yattador
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_18: upakramopasaṃhārakramo dvividhaḥ parighaṭitaḥ / sa cātra śloke na yujyata ity āha
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:11_19: - evaṃ ceti / tadupādāna iti / yacchabdo nātra tad eti prakrāntas tacchabdaḥ parāmṛśyate
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_0: nanu prayogadarśanam evātra samarthakaṃ bhaviṣyatīty āśaṅkya prayogasya prāmādikapāṭhaviparyāsahetukatvam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_1: āha - mīlitam iti / tadabhinnārthaḥ tacchabdābhinnārthaḥ / tasya adaśśabdasya / tacchabdābhinnārthatve
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_2: 'daśśabdasya dūṣaṇadvayam uktam / kevalādaśśabdapryoge asau marud ityādau yacchabdākāṅkṣā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_3: syād ity ekaṃ yacchabdasahāyasyādaśśabdasya prayoge yo 'sau jagattrayetyādau prayuktatacchabdākāṅkṣā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_4: na syād iti dvitīyam / atra yasya prakopetyadaśśabdarahitayacchabdaprayogo dṛṣṭāntatvenokto
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_5: yathāsya kevalasya tacchabdākāṅkṣā tathādaśśabdayuktasyāpīty arthaḥ / parikalpyata
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_6: iti tasya yathoktavastv iti yathā avigānena śiṣṭaprasiddhipāraṃparyeṇoktaṃ vastu
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_7: tacchabdārthavivikto viṣayas tasya tanmate asaṃbhavaḥ / tvayā hy adaśśabdasya tacchabdārthatvam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_8: ucyate tatra yacchabdaparāmarśāpekṣāprasaṅgaḥ ity arthaḥ / parikalpyata iti prayogapravāhaprāmāṇyānyathānupapattyāvāyātayārthāpattyety
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_9: arthaḥ / tam antareṇeti / tacchabdena prayogapravāhaḥ parāmṛṣṭaḥ / tadatadarthatvaniścayo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_10: vivakṣitāvivakṣitārthatvaniścayaḥ / yadi tu tām iti tadabhinnārthatānupapattiḥ parāmṛṣṭā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_11: gate 'nugataṃ yasya sa gatānugatikaḥ / matvarthīyo 'tra ṭhanpratyayaḥ / yenaiva pathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_12: eko gacchati tenaivāvicāritenaiva yo gacchati sa ity arthaḥ / tato bhāvapratyayaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_13: avikalpam ity akārapraśleṣaḥ / niśśaṅkam ity arthaḥ / yad vā na vikalpamātreṇa, api
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_14: tu sākṣād ity arthaḥ / smṛtibhūḥ kāmaḥ / dvitīyaḥ smṛtibhūśabdaḥ smaraṇaviṣaye prayuktaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_15: dagdhatvāt smṛtimātraśeṣa ity arthaḥ / kṣatāt vadhāt / vyavahitānām eveti yathā yo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:12_16: 'vikalpam ityādau / avyavahitatve veti / yathā smṛtibhūr ityādau / etadartham evodāharaṇadvayam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:13_0: tatra hīti idamādisahitaprayoge / tayor iti yattadoḥ / taditareti yadṛcchayaikataraprayoge
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:13_1: anyatarāpekṣety arthaḥ / sutarām iti idamādisāhityena prayukto yacchabdaḥ svabhāvato
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:13_2: vikāsitāsya eva tacchabdaṃ pratīkṣate, evaṃ tacchabdo 'pi yacchabdam iti jñeyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:13_3: etac ca krameṇodāhṛtaṃ yad etad iti, so 'yam iti ca / tad anyena granthena pradarśaka
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:13_4: upayujyate tadvad asya yacchabdasya na prakrāntaparāmarśe saṃbandho, nāpi prakraṃsyamānavastusamanvayamārgopadeśe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:13_5: tacchabdādhyāhāraḥ śaraṇam / sa ca satkāvyakalaṅkāyamāno heya eva anuktvaiveti yattador
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:13_6: madhye parāmṛśyam anuktvā yatra nirantaraḥ prayogaḥ yathā yat tad ūrjitam ityādau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:13_7: tatra tayor yattador yathāyogaṃ punaḥ prayogo na duṣyati yatha nūnaṃ tad api hāritam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:13_8: ityādau / tathā tayor yattadoḥ / nirantaranirdiṣṭeṣv idamādiṣu satsu tayor yattadoḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:13_9: teṣām idamādīnāṃ ca saṅghaṭitatvena sthitānāṃ yathāyogaṃ yattadoḥ pratyavekṣā na
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:13_10: nivarttate yathā aprayukteṣv idamādiṣu kevalayoḥ pṛthagavasthitayor apekṣā na nivarttate
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:13_11: tadvat prayukteṣv apīty arthaḥ yathā yad etac candrāntar iti, so 'yaṃ paṭa iti ca /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:13_12: evaṃ prakṛte 'pi yo 'sāv iti / tatsāṅkaryeti / yacchabdasya pṛthag idamādisāhitye
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:13_13: tacchabdasya ca pṛthag idamādisāhitye yattadoḥ parasparasāhitye ca bahavo bhedāḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:14_1: sa prasaṅgād vicāryate / sa ca puṣṭāpuṣṭaduṣṭabhedena trividhaḥ / puṣṭo 'pi prathamaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:14_3: ceti dvividhaḥ / ārtho 'pi yacchabdamātrānupādāne tacchabdasyopāttasya prasiddhānubhūtaprakrāntaviṣayeṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:14_4: yadābhisaṃbandhāt trividhaḥ / yacchabdasya ca tacchabdānupādāne kevalam upāttasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:14_5: prakrāntaviṣayeṇa kalpitatatkarmādiviṣayeṇa ca tadābhisaṃbandhād dvividhaḥ / ubhayānupādāne
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:14_6: tu dvayor upāttavastuviṣayatākalpana eka eva bhedaḥ / evaṃ śābdo dvividha ārthaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:14_7: ṣaḍbheda ity aṣṭavidho yattador upakramopasaṃhārakramaḥ puṣṭaḥ / tac caitac ceha
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:14_8: granthakṛtodāhṛtam / yat tadūrjitam ityādau tu śābdasyārthasya copasaṃhārakramasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:14_9: saṅkīrṇatvam iti nāsya pṛthagbhāvaḥ / apuṣṭasya duṣṭamadhye prasaṅgena varṇayiṣyamāṇatvād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:14_10: idānīṃ duṣṭo vyākriyate / tatra yattadoḥ sthāne tacchabdayacchabdanairantaryeṇa sāmānādhikaraṇyena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:14_11: cedamādīnaṃ duṣṭataiva teṣām atadarthatvāt tannikaṭe ca prayujyamānānāṃ prasiddhimātraparāmarśakatvād,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:14_12: yathā yo 'sau kutra camatkṛter iti / evaṃ tacchabdasācivyenedamādīnām udāharaṇam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:14_13: ūhyam / viprakṛṣṭatvena sannikṛṣṭatve 'pi vaiyadhikaraṇyena vā teṣām prayoge na duṣṭaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:14_14: nāduṣṭam ity apuṣṭatvam eva yathā yo 'vikalpam iti smṛtibhūḥ smṛtibhūr iti ca / evaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:14_17: śaśikalāmaulir ityādau / pradhānagrahaṇena na kartṛmātraṃ nirdiṣṭam, api tu kārakāntaram
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:17_0: iti medinyās tacchabdaparāmarśo na sundara ity āhuḥ / yathā yattadoḥ padārthavākyārthagatatvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:17_1: dvividhāvasthāne yad ekasya padārthaniṣṭhatvād anyasya vākyārthaviṣayatvaṃ tad bhinnaviṣayatvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:18: hemrāṃ bhāraśatāni vā madamucāṃ bṛndāni vā dantināṃ śrīharṣeṇa yad arpitāni guṇine bāṇāya kutrādya tat /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:19: yā bāṇena tu tasya sūktivisarair uṭṭaṅkitāḥ kīrttayas tat kalpapralaye 'pi yānti na manāṅ manye parimlānatām //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:20_0: iti / yā iti padārthaviṣayatvam anipātasya tacchabdasya / tad iti tu vākyārthaviṣayas
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:20_1: tacchabdaḥ / padārthaviṣaye tā iti syāt / atraiva yad bāṇena tu tasyeti tāḥ kalpapralaye
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:20_2: 'pi iti ca pāṭhe yado vākyārthaviṣayatve tadaḥ padārthaniṣṭhatva udāharaṇaṃ deyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:20_3: tasmād yā bāṇena tv iti tāḥ kalpapralaye 'pīti ca paṭhanīyam / iha tu
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:21: indīvaraṃ yadatasīkusumasya vṛttyā yat ketakaṃ jaraḍhabhūrjadalānuvṛttyā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:22: yan manyase ca vakulaṃ karavīravṛttyā sā sāmprataṃ madhupa hanta tavaiva hāniḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:23_0: iti na kevalaṃ yacchabdo vākyārthaviṣaye, yāvat tacchabdo 'pi / yadi paraṃ sa vākyārtho
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:23_1: hānipadena piṇḍīkṛtya prakāśitas tacchabdena parāmṛṣṭaḥ / ata evātra tacchabdasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:23_2: vidheyapadārthābhiprāyeṇa strīliṅgatvam / anuvādyābhiprāyeṇa tu tat sāmpratam iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:24_0: kiṃ ca yattador nityābhisaṃbandhād guṇapradhānayoś ca saṃbandhārhatvāt parāmṛśya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:24_1: ekatra yacchabdavākye tacchabdavākye vā nirdiṣṭa itaravākye tadā yadā vā pratyavamṛśyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:24_2: yacchabdavākye tu nirdiṣṭena yacchabdāntareṇa guṇānāṃ pradhānānāṃ ca parasparam abhisaṃbandhāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:24_3: evaṃ ca tathā parāmarśe dvau duṣṭābhedau / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:25: yeṣāṃ tās tridaśebhadānasaritaḥ pītāḥ pratāpoṣmabhir līlāpānabhuvaś ca nandanatarucchāyāsu yaiḥ kalpitāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:26: yeṣāṃ huṅkṛtayaḥ kṛtāmarapurakṣobhāḥ kṣapācāriṇāṃ kiṃ tais tvatparitoṣakāri vihitaṃ kiṃ cit pravādocitam //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:27_0: iti / kṣapācāriṇām iti ṣaṣṭhyantaṃ yacchabdena saṃbaddhaṃ yacchadbāntareṇa partyavamṛṣṭam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:27_1: kṣapācāribhir iti pāṭho nyāyyaḥ / evaṃ tacchabdavākye nirdiṣṭaṃ yacchabdaiḥ parāmṛśyamānaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:28: puṇḍrekṣoḥ paripākapāṇḍunibiḍe yo madhyame parvaṇi khyātaḥ kiṃ ca rasaḥ kaṣāyamadhuro yo rājajambūphale /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:29: tasyāsvādadaśāviluṇṭanapaṭur yeṣāṃ vacovibhramaḥ sarvatraiva jayanti citramatayas te bharttṛmeṇḍādayaḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:30: iti / atra dvitīye yacchabdavākye rasaḥ parāmṛśyo nirdiṣṭas tacchabdena parāmṛśyate / prathame yacchabdavākye tu yacchadaparāmarśo na yujyate dvayor asaṃbandhād, yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:31: namo 'stu tābhyo bhuvane jayanti tāḥ sudhāmucas tāś ca kavīndrasūktayaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:32: bhavaikavicchedi kathāśarīratām upaiti yāsāṃ caritaṃ pinākinaḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:33_0: iti kavīndrasūktīnāṃ tacchabdavati vākyena nirdiṣṭānāṃ tacchabdāntareṇa parāmarśo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:33_1: na yuktaḥ / kiṃ ca yattacchabdayoḥ svabhāvena vākyabhedotthāpakatve yad ekataravākye
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:33_2: 'nyatarat padaṃ prayujyānyatarat prayujyate tad api duṣṭam eva / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:34: aprākṛtasya caritātiśayaiś ca dṛṣṭair atyadbhutair apahṛtasya tathāpi nāsthā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:35: ko 'py eṣa vīraśiśukākṛtir aprameyamāhātmyasārasam udāyamayaḥ padārthaḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:36: ity atra yady apīty apekṣitam / na ca tadekavākyatāyāṃ saṃbandhuṃ yogyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:37_0: ekatrāpi vākye guṇakriyādigataṃ kalpitaṃ bhedam āśritya prakrāntavastuviṣayatacchabdaprayoge
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:37_1: pradhānakriyāyāṃ parāmṛśyasya pradhānatvād eva svarūpeṇa nirdeśe guṇakriyādiviṣaye
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:37_2: tu tacchabdena parāmarśe nyāyye yadviparyayakaraṇaṃ tad duṣṭam eva / yathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:38: prajānām eva bhūtyarthaṃ sa tābhyo balim agrahīt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:39: sahasraguṇam utsraṣṭum ādatte hi rasaṃ raviḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:40: iti / baliṃ prajābhyo jagrāha sa tāsām eva bhūtaye iti yuktaḥ pāṭhaḥ / tathaikaviṣayatve yattador ekasya dravyādiviṣayatve 'nyasya kālādigocaratve duṣṭam eva / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:41: tvam evaṃ saundaryā sa ca ruciratāyāḥ paricitaḥ kalānāṃ sīmānaṃ param iha yuvām eva bhajathaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:42: ayi! dvandvaṃ diṣṭyā tad iti subhage! saṃvadati vāmataḥ śeṣaṃ yat syāj jitam iha tadānīṃ guṇitayā //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:43: atra ataḥ śeṣaṃ cet syād iti paṭhanīyaṃ cec chabdasya yadiśabdārthatvāt / tathā prakrāntaviṣayatve tacchabdasya vyavasthite tadviṣaye prakramyamāṇavastugocaratvaṃ doṣa eva / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:44: ye saṃtoṣasukhaprabuddhamanasas teṣāṃ na bhinno mado ye 'py ete dhanalobhasaṃkuladhiyas teṣāṃ tu dūre nṛṇām /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:45: itthaṃ kasya kṛte kṛtaḥ sa vidhinā tādṛk padaṃ saṃpadāṃ svātmany eva samāptahemamahimā merur na me rocate //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:46: atra meruḥ prakramyamāṇaḥ sa ity anena parāmṛṣṭaḥ / etad vākyabheda udāharaṇam / ekavākye tu:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:47: tīrthe tadīye gajasetubandhāt pratīpagām uttarato 'sya gaṅgām /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:48: iti deyam / tathā nirvīpsenaikenopakrame savīpsenānyena parāmarśo duṣṭa eva / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:49: yaḥ kalyāṇabahirbhūtaḥ sa sa durgatim aśnute /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:50: savīpsena tv ekena prakrame nirvīpsenānyenopasaṃhāraḥ savīpsasya pratyavamṛṣṭatvād na duṣṭānvayaḥ kin tv apuṣṭa eva / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:51: kalyāṇānāṃ tvam asi mahasāmīśiṣe tvaṃ vidhatse puṇyāṃ lakṣmīm iha mayi ciraṃ dhehi deva! prasīda /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:52: yad yat pratijahi jagannātha! namrasya tan me bhadraṃ bhadraṃ vitara bhagavan! bhūyase maṅgalāya //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:53: iti / atra yad yad iti nirdiṣṭaṃ kevalena tacchabdena parāmṛṣṭam / etad yacchabdasya savīpsasyodāharaṇam / tacchabdasya tu savīpsasya nirvīpsena parāmarśa udāharaṇaṃ yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:54: kṣāntaṃ na kṣamayā gṛhocitasukhaṃ tyaktaṃ na santoṣataḥ soḍho dussahaśītavātatapanakleśo na taptaṃ tapaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:55: dhyātaṃ nityam ahar niśaṃ niyamitaprāṇair na śambhoḥ padaṃ tat tat karma kṛtaṃ yad eva munibhis tais taiḥ phalair vañcitāḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:56: iti / yatra tu savīpsasya prakrame savīpsena pratyavamarśas tatra puṣṭatvam eva yathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:57: yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibhartti svabhujagurum adaḥ pāṇḍavīnāṃ camūnāṃ yo yaḥ pāñcālagotre śiśur adhikavayā garbhaśayyāṃ gato vā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:58: yo yas tatkarmasākṣī carati mayi raṇe yaś ca yaś ca pradīptaḥ krodhāndhas tasya tasya svayam api jagatām antakasyāntako 'ham //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:59: iti / yatra cānekasya savīpsasya cānekena pratyavamarśas, tatrāpi puṣṭatvam eva / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:60: yo yo yaṃ yam avāpnuyād avayavoddeśaṃ spṛśan pāṇinā tat tanmātrakam eva yatra sa sa te rūpaṃ paraṃ manyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:61: tajjātyandhapuraṃ ha hā karipate! nīto 'si durvedhasā ko nāmātra bhaved batākhilabhavan māhātmyavedī janaḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:62_0: iti / yadi paraṃ yaṃ yam iti prakrame tat tanmātrakam eveti pratyavamarśe vidheyāvimarśaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:62_1: savīpsasya tadarthasya samāse guṇībhāvāt / naitat / mātragrahaṇenāvadhāraṇam ucyate
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:62_3: ity avadhāryamāṇasyaiva savīpsasya tadarthasyodrekāt prādhānyam akhaṇḍitam eva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:62_4: pūrvapadārthaprādhānyena kva cit supsupeti samāso dṛśyate, yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:63: nirvāṇabhūyiṣṭham athāsya vīryaṃ sandhukṣayantīva vapur guṇena /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:65_0: iti / atra hi bhūyiṣṭhaṃ nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇabhūyiṣṭham iti samāse nirvāṇārthasyaiva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:65_1: prādhānyaṃ tasya vīryaviśeṣaṇatvenāvasthitatvād / na tadvad iha tattanmātrakam iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:65_2: tadarthasya prādhānyaṃ bhaviṣyati / kevalaṃ kṛte 'vadhāraṇārthe mātraśabde kimarthaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:65_3: kapratyayaḥ / tasminn api vā kṛte evaśabdaḥ kimarthaḥ / evaśabda eva vā kiṃ na kriyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:65_4: naitat / kapratyayasya tāvad atra kutsāpratipādakatvāt / na paunaruktyaṃ tan tameveti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:65_5: kevalaivaśabdaprayoge vikṣipta iva tadarthaḥ pratīyate / mātragrahaṇe tu piṇḍitasyaiva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:65_6: tadarthasya pratītir ity asti viśeṣaḥ / yadi paraṃ dvayor upādānaṃ lokapratītyanusaraṇena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:65_8: prayogaḥ / yathā - bālā kevalam eva roditi galallolodakair aśrubhiḥ / atraiva tad
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:65_9: iti nirvīpsena tadā nirdiṣṭaṃ jātyandhapuraṃ nirvīpsenaiva yadā pratyavamṛśyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:65_10: tataś cātrānuguṇaparāmarśān na doṣaḥ kaś cit /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:66: tathā yatra pūrvavākye yacchabdo nirdiṣṭa uttaravākye tu na tacchabdo nirdiṣṭaḥ, tatra sākāṅkṣatvād duṣṭaiva yathā -
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:67: mīlitaṃ yad abhirāmatādhike sādhu candramasi puṣkaraiḥ kṛtam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:68_0: iti / uttaravākyagatatvena tu yacchabdaprayoge pūrvavākye tacchabdaprayoge na duṣṭatvam,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:68_1: api tu prākpratipāditaṃ puṣṭatvam eva sāmānyenopakramāt paścād viśeṣasyotthāpanāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:68_2: etadabhiprāyeṇa kalpitatatkarmādiviṣayatvam uktam / udāharaṇaṃ tu sādhu candramasi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:68_3: puṣkaraiḥ kṛtaṃ mīlitaṃ yadabhirāmatādhike iti pūrvaślokārdhapāṭhaviparyaye yathā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:68_4: yattacchabdayor aviśiṣṭe 'pi parāmarśakatve uttaravākye nirdiṣṭo yacchabdaḥ svabhāvata
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:68_5: āvidūryeṇa pūrvavākyārthāśliṣṭatayā vastu parāmṛśati, tacchabdas tu parokṣāyamāṇārthaniṣṭhatvāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:68_6: vaidūryeṇa / āvidūryaṃ ca prakṛtārthaṃ prakṛṣṭatāṃ nayad vākyārthaṃ śleṣayati / tataś
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:68_7: ca tathābhūte viṣaye yacchabdasya prayogārhatve tacchabdasya prayogo 'puṣṭa eva.
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:69: tasyāḥ śalākāñjananirmiteva kāntir bhruvor ānatarekhayor yā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:70: tāṃ vīkṣya līlācaturām anaṅgaḥ svacāpasaundaryam adaṃ mumoca //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:71: atra sā yāṃ vīkṣyeti yattadau viparyayeṇa paṭhanīyau / yathā ca:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:72: dṛṣṭir nāmṛtavarṣiṇī smitamadhuprasyandi vaktraṃ na kiṃ nārdrārdraṃ hṛdayaṃ na candanarasasparśāni vāṅgāni ca /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:73: kasmin labdhapadena te kṛtam idaṃ krūreṇa dagdhāgninā nūnaṃ vajramayo 'nya eva dahanas tasyedam āceṣṭitam //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:75: ācāryo me sa khalu bhagavān asmadgrāhyanāmā tasmād eṣā dhanur upaniṣat tatprasādāt kṣamo 'pi /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:76: adhyāsīnaḥ katham aham aho vartma vaikhānasānāṃ sītāpāṇigrahaṇapaṇitaṃ cāpam āropayāmi //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:77_0: atra ca yasmād eṣā dhanur upaniṣad iti paṭhanīyam / evaṃ ca prāg ukte hemno bhārataśatānītyādau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:77_1: tā bāṇena tu tasya sūktivisarair uṭṭaṅkitāḥ kīrtayo yāḥ kalpapralaye 'pi yānti na
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:77_2: manāṅ manye parimlānatām iti paṭhanīyam / api ca parāmṛśyam anuktvā yacchabdena ca
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:77_3: vākyārthopakrame tacchabdavati parāmṛśyanirdeśe pūrvavākyārthe parāmṛśyam aspṛśantī
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:77_4: upaplavamānā pratītir iti vākyārthapratipattiviprakarṣād apuṣṭatvam / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:79: svasthād evāvamānena dehinas tad varaṃ rajaḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:80_0: ata evātra ślokārdhayor viparyayapāṭhe puṣṭatvam eva / tathā pūrvavākyārthe nirdiṣṭasyārthasyottaravākyārthe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:80_1: sarvanāmamātreṇa parāmarśe nyāyye yaḥ svaśabdasahitasya sarvanāmno nirdeśaḥ sa duṣṭa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:81: udanvacchinnā bhūḥ sa ca nidhir apāṃ yojanaśataṃ sadā pānthaḥ pūṣā gaganaparimāṇaṃ kalayati /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:82: iti prāyo bhāvaḥ sphuradavadhimudrāmukulitaḥ satāṃ prajñonmeṣaḥ punar ayam asīmā vijayate //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:83_0: iti / atra sa ca nidhir apām iti sasvaśabdaḥ sarvanāmno nirdeśaḥ / evaṃ rāmagiryāśrameṣv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:83_1: iti prakṛte tasminn adrau kati cid ity atra jñeyam / atra tu ke cit samarthayante
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:83_2: - rāmagiryāśrameṣv iti rāmagiriḥ samāsa upasarjanībhūto buddhāv udrekeṇānavabhāsāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:83_3: kathaṃ sarvanāmnā parāmṛśyate sarvanāmnānusandhir vṛtticchannasyeti pradhānabhūtaparāmṛśyābhiprāyeṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:83_4: sthitaṃ yathā samyagjñānapūrvikā sarvapuruṣārthasiddhir iti tad vyutpādyate iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:83_5: atrādrāv iti nirdiśyamānam adrimātrapratīter na prakṛtam adriṃ gamayet / tasmād ubhayam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:83_6: atropādeyaṃ yathā atha śabdnānuśāsanam / keṣāṃ śabdānām iti / giriśabdena girau prakrānta
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:83_7: adriśabdena paryāyāntareṇa tv āgatam āsamañjasyaṃ duṣpariharam eveti / udanvacchinnā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:83_8: bhūr ity atra tu udanvataḥ parāmṛśyasya naikaṭhyād yogyatvāc ca bhuvaḥ strītvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:83_9: sa iti parāmarśānarhatvāc ca sarvanāmaparāmarśa eva yukto, na punaḥ svaśabdagocaratvam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:83_10: ity atra duṣṭataiva / kiṃ ca samudāyasya kasya cit kena cid vākyena nirdeśe vākyāntare
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:83_11: tadavayavasya nirdhāreṇa karttavye tasya samudāyasaya nirdhāraṇaviṣayapratītaye yacchabdena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:83_12: nirdeśe karttavye nirdhāryamāṇasyāvayavasya nirdeśo duṣṭa eva / yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:84: tasmād ajāyata manur navarājabījaṃ yasyānvaye sa sagaraḥ sa bhagīrathaś ca /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:85: ekena yena jaladhiḥ parikhānito 'yam anyena siddhasaritā paripūritaś ca //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:86_0: atra sa sagaraḥ sa bhagīrathaś ceti yan nirdiṣṭaṃ tasyaiketyādinā nirdhāraṇaṃ vihitam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:86_1: nirdhāraṇaṃ ca jātiguṇakriyābhiḥ samudāyād ekadeśasya pṛthak karaṇam / na cātra samudāyaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:86_2: kena cit padena nirdiṣṭaḥ / yaccaikeneti nirdiṣṭam, tan na samudāyaḥ, api tv ekadeśaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:86_3: tataś ca nirdeśyānirdeśād anirdeśyanirdeśyāc cātra duṣṭatvam / evaṃ ca samudāyasyaiva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:86_4: nirdhāraṇaviṣayasya yacchabdena nirdeśe karttavye eko yayor jalanidhīn nicakhāna
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:86_5: sapta gāṅgaiḥ payobhir abhivarṣitavān dvitīyaḥ iti pāṭhaḥ śreyān /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:87: kva cid yattacchabdāv agrahaṇena vidhyanuvādabhāvena vākyārthaprastāve yadantarānyathākaraṇaṃ tatra duṣṭatvaṃ yathā:
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:88: yat tvannetrasamānakānti salile magnaṃ tad indīvaram
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:89_0: iti / atra prathamatṛtīyayoḥ pādayor yattacchabdaparigraheṇa vidhyanuvādabhāvenopanibandhaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:89_1: dvitīyapādagatatvena tadullaṅghanaṃ doṣaḥ / indīvarāṇāṃ rājahaṃsānāṃ ca bahutvāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:89_3: candrasya tv ekatvāt tadakaraṇam iti ke cit / tad asat / candrasyāpi dvitīyācandrādibhedena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:89_4: bahutvasaṃbhavāt tatrāpi vidhyanuvādabhāvo yuktaḥ / indīvarāṇāṃ vyaktibhedena mukhyo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:89_5: bhedaḥ / candrasya punar ekavyaktirūpasya kālabhedād avasthābhedāc ca bhinnatvam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:89_6: amukhyam iti cen na / bhinnā eva candravyaktayaḥ / anyo hi dvitīyācandro 'nyaś ca
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:89_7: pūrṇacandraḥ / ataś caiva dvitīyācandrādivyāvṛttyā pūrṇacandrapratītyarthaṃ mukhacchāyānukārīti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:89_8: viśeṣaṇaṃ dattam / na hi śaśiśabdaḥ pūrṇacandrābhidhāyī, tasya candramātravācakatvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:89_9: saṅkhyāvyavahāreṣu candrasyaikatvapratītir iti cet / kva cij jātivyavahāreṣv apīndīvarādīnām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:89_10: ekatvaṃ siddham / tasmāt kavivyavahāre candragatatvenānekatvasya vyavahārāt tadāśrayeṇeha
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:91: masṛṇacaraṇapātaṃ gamyatāṃ bhūḥ sadarbhā viracaya sicayāntaṃ mūrdhni gharmaḥ kaṭhoraḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:92_0: iti / atra viracaya sicayāntam ity atra tacchabdo hetvartho viniveśayitavyas tṛtīyapādādau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:92_1: niveśitaḥ / na ca tatra tasyopayogaḥ / kṛtas tatra pratītikuṇṭhatvam utpādayatīti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:92_2: kva cit pradhānakriyāyās tadādisarvanāmnā parāmṛṣṭasya guṇakriyāyāṃ svaśabdenopādānaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:92_3: duṣṭam eva / yathā pratyāsanne nabhasi iti / atra tasmai iti sarvanāmnā pūrvaprakrānto
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:92_4: meghaḥ parāmṛśyata utaitacchlokagato jīmūtaḥ / tatrādye pakṣe jīmūtagrahaṇam anarthakaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:92_5: pradhānakriyāyāṃ tadā parāmṛṣṭasya pūrvaprakrāntasyaiva meghasyārthataḥ saṃbandhayogyatvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:92_6: na hi yāvatāṃ yena saṃbandhas tāvatāṃ pratyekaṃ nirdeśaḥ kriyate / ekatra kṛto 'nyatrākāṅkṣādinopajīvyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:92_7: tasmāj jīmūtagrahaṇaṃ na karttavyaṃ, kṛtaṃ pratyuta vastvantarapratītiṃ janayad vairasyam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:92_8: āvahati / atha tacchabdenaitacchokagato jīmūtaḥ pratyavamṛśyate / tad asat / sarvatrātra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:92_9: prakaraṇe pūrvaprakrāntasyaiva meghasya parāmarśaḥ sthita itīhāpi tathaiva parāmarśo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:92_10: nyāyya iti punar api jīmūtagrayaṇam anarthakam eva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_0: itthaṃ dvitīyaṃ vidheyāvimarśaṃ vivicya tṛtīyam apy atraiva śloke prapañcayitum upakramate
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_1: - api cetyādinā / prāyeṇeti dvandvaṃ varjayitvā tatra yugapadadhukaraṇavacanatayā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_2: sāmarthyaṃ prakārāntareṇa samarthitam / tatrādya iti tatpuruṣaḥ samānādhikaraṇaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_3: karmadhārayaḥ iti vacanāt / bahuvrīhiḥ samānādhikaraṇānām iti vacanāt prāyeṇa bahuvrīhiḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_4: samānādhikaraṇaviṣaya eva / susūkṣmajaṭakeśādau tu vyadhikaraṇānām apīṣyate / tatraiva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_5: samānādhikaraṇe padārthe / yadā saṅkhyāyā iti vyadhikaraṇa saṅkhyāpūrvo dviguḥ iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_6: vacanāt / pratiṣedhasyeti nañ iti nañsūtrārambhāt / dvitīya iti vyadhikaraṇaḥ / kārakāṇām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_7: iti kartṛkaraṇe kṛtā bahulam ityādinā / saṃbandhasyeti ṣaṣṭhī ityādinā / tatrāpīti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_8: kārakasaṃbandhayoge adhistri upakumbham ityādau / svāśrayo viśeṣyam / vidheyadhurām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_9: iti śabdavṛtte yo vidheyaḥ tasya kakṣyāṃ vāstavīṃ vidheyatām ity arthaḥ / anūdyamānakalpatayeti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_10: śābdaṃ prādhānyam anapekṣya vāstavena prādhānyenety arthaḥ / astam iyād iti ekārthībhāvād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_11: vibhaktatvenāpratīter ity arthaḥ / ekatreti vidheyānuvādyagarbhatve / anyatreti saṃbandhamātrapratipādane /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_12: vikalyeteti mahāvibhāṣayā vyavasthitavibhāṣātvād iti bhāvaḥ / ekasyaiveti / viśeṣaṇagatasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_13: prādhānyasya anyasya tadgatasyaivāprādhānyasya / ekasya hīti, aparasya punar iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_14: ca / atra phalabheda ity atra prakrāntaṃ phalaṃ saṃbandhanīyam / atra codayati virodhasyobhayavastuniṣṭhatvāsiddher
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_15: atrābhāva uktaḥ / tad asat / tarhi na hi sahānavasthānalakṣaṇo vastugata eka eva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_16: virodhaḥ bhedo, yaḥ śītoṣṇādau labdhavṛttiḥ / kiṃ tarhi parasparaparihārasthitatālakṣaṇo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_17: vastvavastutvāśrayo dvitīyo 'py asti virodhaprakāraḥ / tadā hi yadi vastvāśrayo na
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_18: saṃbhavati virodho vastvavastutvāśrayas tu kathaṃ na syād / ataś ca syāt pūrvapakṣavelāyāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_19: bhāvābhāvayor evety uktam / naiṣa doṣaḥ / vastvavastvāśrayasya virodhasya tādātmyaniṣedhe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_20: vyāpārāt / yadi nāma prādhānyaṃ, tasyām eva kakṣyāyāṃ svayam aprādhānyaṃ na syād,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_21: aprādhānye vā prādhānyam / prādhānyavidheye punar apekṣāntareṇāprādhānyaṃ kathaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_22: na syāt / na syād, yadi śītoṣṇavad dvayor vastutvaṃ syāt / na cātraitad asti vaivakṣikasyāvastutvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_23: yathā rājapuruṣa ity atra rājño vaivakṣikam eva prādhānyaṃ vāstavaṃ punar aprādhānyam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_24: eva tadvad atrāpi draṣṭavyam / tad ayam atra piṇḍārthaḥ saṃsarganiṣedho 'tra kartavyaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:93_25: sa ca vastudvayaniṣṭha iti dvayor atrābhāvān naikenāparatra pratiṣedha iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_0: anyeneti viśeṣyābhidhāyinety arthaḥ / anyonyam iti / parasparaviśeṣaṇānāṃ yady api
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_1: viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyeṇa iti viśeṣaṇasya viśeṣyeṇaiva samāsa uktaḥ, tathāpi kāṇakhañjādiṣu
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_2: siddhaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayor yatheṣṭatvād iti vacanenaikasya viśeṣyatvavivakṣām āśritya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_3: parasparaṃ viśeṣaṇānāṃ samāsaḥ samarthitaḥ / tadabhiprāyeṇānyonyam iti saṃbhāvanā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_4: dārasukha iti dārāṇāṃ sukheti tatpuruṣaḥ kartavyaḥ / bahuvrīhau rājāhassakhibhyaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_5: iti ṭac na syāt / he hasteti / mṛtasya śiśor dvijasya ity atra samāsaḥ śaṅkitaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_6: rāmasya pāṇir asi iti tu ṣaṣṭhīsamāsa udāharaṇam / atra kva cit kartṝṇām karmaṇāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_7: ca prathamāntānāṃ kvāpi saṃbandhināṃ karmaṇāṃ ca ṣaṣṭhyantānāṃ kutrāpy āmantraṇānāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_8: samāsaḥ śaṅkitaḥ / vakṣyamāṇanayeneti / vyāsaḥ pārāśaryaḥ ityādivicāreṣu / cāpācārya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_9: iti / atra hi tripuravijayitvādyanuvādena cāpācāryatvādividhiḥ / anūdyamānaś cārtho
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_10: vidheyasyotkarṣam āvahan pratīyate / na caivam iti upendravajrasthāne indravajraprayogāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_11: upagatam asmābhir iti / duḥśravatvam api vṛttasya śabdānaucityam eva / tasyāpy anuprāsāder
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_12: ivetyādivadadbhiḥ / atra yathā ca kāraṇaguṇe ityādigranthaḥ antaraślokaparyantaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_13: pratyudāharaṇaṃ yathā taṃ kṛpāmṛdur ity ataḥ pūrvaṃ paṭhitaḥ sāmañjasyaṃ bhajate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_14: pratyudāharaṇaṃ ceti udāharaṇagranthaḥ samañjasa eva syāt / dṛśyate ca pustakeṣv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_15: evaṃ pāṭhaḥ / tasmād atra jāgaraṇīyam / kāraṇam atra parāśāro jamadagniś ca / tadabhāve
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_16: hetur iti tacchabdena samāsaḥ parāmṛṣṭaḥ / tataś cātra pārāśaryādipadaṃ vyāsādāv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_17: utkarṣam arpayat punar uktam / takṣakasarpa iti takṣakaśabdenaivātra sarpaviśeṣatvāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_18: sarpatve pratīte sarpapadam utkarṣasamarpaṇapravaṇam eveti tadarthasya vidheyatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_19: lohitas takṣaka iti yathā takṣakaśabdād eva sarpatvajātiḥ pratītā tadval lohitalakṣaṇo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_20: guṇo 'pi tata evāvyabhicārāt pratītaḥ / tatas tau jātiguṇau vidheyatābhiprāyeṇoktau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_21: na samāsa nyagbhāvanīyau / uktanyāyād iti vidheyatvān na samāsaḥ pravartata ity arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_22: pakṣo na cāsty anyas tadatyaye iti / iha dvau pakṣāv ullikhitau takṣakasya svarūpamātrapratipādanaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:94_23: vā lohitākhyaguṇavidhir vā / ubhayatrāpi kṛtā carcā / tadatyaye ca kathitapakṣadvayātikrame
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:95_0: evam iyatā karmadhārayaṃ vicārya bahuvrīhinirūpaṇāyāha bahuvrīhau yatheti / tatas
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:95_1: tad iti sthalīkaraṇādi yad viśeṣaṇatayopāttaṃ tat parāmṛśyate / tair vidhyādibhiḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:95_4: yuktaiva kāryotpattir ity arthaḥ / etadabhyupagame dṛṣṭavirodham āha / evaṃ hīti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:95_5: naiva veti nyāyāviśeṣāt / ardhajaratīyam iti ardhaṃ jaratyā iti samāsāc ca tadviṣayā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:95_6: iti cchapratyayaḥ / yathā jaratyā varāṅgaṃ kāmayate mukhaṃ na kāmayate tadvad evety
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:95_7: arthaḥ / tat tasya iti tad iti tasmāt / tau sūryacandramasau / tayor iti anuvādyayos
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:95_8: sūryācandramasoḥ / pāramparyeṇeti vidheyatām āha pitāmahatvadvāreṇa / ata eva sūryācandramasāv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:95_9: iti dvandvanirdeśo dvayoḥ spardhitāṃ prakāśayati / urvaśyā ca bhuvā ceti samāsābhāvo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:95_10: varaṇasya mukhyāmukhyatvapradarśanārtham ekasya vāstavatvād aparasya kaviprauḍhoktiniṣpāditatvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:95_11: iha ceti pratītivaicitryaṃ spaṣṭataram eva dhārayatu matimān iti pāścātya sanbandhanāyaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:95_12: janaka iti / atra janakākhyarājarṣiprabhṛtayaḥ pitṛtvāder utkarṣam arpayanti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:96_0: evaṃ bahuvrīhiṃ vicārya dviguṃ vyācaṣṭe dvigau yatheti / niravaśeṣa iti saptatvasaṅkhyāyāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:96_1: vidheyatvena saṃrambhāspadatvaṃ samāse tu nyagbhāvāt / daśasv iti daśatvasaṅkhyāyā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:96_2: vidheyatvaṃ rāvaṇasya paribhavātiśayaṃ prakāśayati ekasminn api mūrdhani padanyāsaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:96_3: paribhavāspadaṃ kiṃ punar daśāsv iti / pratyudāharaṇaṃ saptāṅgyām iha yasya sa itītyādipāṭhe /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:96_4: vaiśasaṃ bādhaḥ / evaṃ dviguṃ vyākhyāya nañsamāsaṃ vyācaṣṭe nañsamāseti / upadarśitam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:96_5: iti asaṃrabdhavān ity atra vidheyāvimarśavicāre anuktavān iti noktavān iti vācyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:96_6: tatpuruṣe kartrādīnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ kārakāṇāṃ saṃbandhasya ca krameṇodāharaṇāny āha deśetyādinā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:96_7: so 'yam iti / atra sa evāyam iti vyākhyā / ahitasaṃbandhināṃ śastrāṇāṃ ghasmarāṇi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:96_8: grasanaśīlāni ata eva gurūṇi / karaṇaṃ pratīti kriyāṃ pratīty arthaḥ / tat tasyeti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:96_9: prakrāntasya viśeṣyasya karaṇasya / tasyeti rāmasya / śauryaṃ balam / nighnaḥ paravaśaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:97_0: anekeṣām iti / anekaśabdasya nañsamāse uttarapadārthaprādhānyād ekavacanaprasaṅgaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:97_1: satyam kiṃ tu nañprayogaviṣaye ekaśabdasyaikavyatiriktavastuviṣayatvaṃ yathā abrāhmaṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:97_2: ity atra brāhmaṇaśabdasya kṣatriyādigocaratvam / ekavyatiriktaṃ ca vastu kadā cid
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:97_3: ekatvoparaktaṃ pratīyate, kadā cin nijenaiva svarūpeṇa / ādye pakṣe anekam iti bhavati
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:97_4: dvitīye tv anekānīti / yathā ca padamañjariḥ patañjaliḥ - pravṛttibhede prayojakaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:97_5: cittam ekam anekeṣām iti / gurudattam iti guruṇā dattam iti vācyam / tat tasyā iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:97_6: sītāyā viśeṣaṇabhūtāyāḥ sītākartṛtkāyā gamanakriyāyā ity arthaḥ / gurvartham iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:97_7: gurave idaṃ gurvartham iti kriyāviśeṣaṇam etat / kriyāviśeṣaṇānāṃ karmatvaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgatvaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:97_8: ca / īpsitatamatve tu ṣaṣṭhī syāt / arthanakriyāmukheneti arthayata iti nigamanāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:97_9: tat tasyeti tad gurvartham iti viśeṣaṇam / tasyārthinaḥ / avamatatām anabhipretatām /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:97_10: avamatatvaṃ garhitatvam / sutanirviśeṣam iti / kriyāviśeṣaṇam eva / pradakṣiṇakriyety
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:97_12: evaṃ prathamaprabodhita iti prāthamyasya / tathā yathākāmatvayathākālatvayor jñeyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:98_1: lekhanaṃ praty utkarṣanimittam api samāse guṇīkṛtaḥ / pūrvavad iti kṛtasamāsavaiśasam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:98_2: tac ca vipradattam iti pāṭhe / pitāmahapitāmatayeti pitāmaho brahmā pitāmahaḥ pūrvapuruṣo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:98_3: yasya / tayor janmanidhanayoḥ / tadvato janmanidhanavataḥ / tābhyāṃ janmanidhanābhyām /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:98_4: kṭāntād adhikam āsamudrāt kṣitīśānām iti ca vācyam / apādānasamānanyāyatvād avadhir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:98_5: api pañcamyanto 'tra gṛhyata iti pratyudāharaṇopapattiḥ / upāgatemeti upāgatā iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99_0: raṇabhūṣita iti / atra raṇabhuvīti vācyam / śocanīyatāgatiḥ kriyā / tatra samāgamaprārthanā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99_1: hetutvenopāttā / tasyāḥ saṃbandhidvāreṇa saṃbandhitvamukhena kapālina iti viśeṣaṇam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99_2: atra saṃbandhiśabdo bhāvavṛttiḥ saṃbandhitve varttate, yathā dvyekayor dvivacanaikavacane
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99_3: iti, sudhīram uvāceti / tat tasyā iti / tad viśeṣaṇam / tasyās samāgamaprārthanāyāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99_4: tatra śocanīyatāgatau / sāmarthyam avyabhicāreṇa sampādakatvam / tasya sakaleti tacchabdaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99_5: kapālina ity asya parāmarśakaḥ / viśeṣyeṇa samāgamaprārthanayety anena / pratyavaraṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99_6: guṇabhūtam / evaṃ tātasyeti, āryasyeti, skandasyeti, taveti cety eṣāṃ viśeṇaṇānām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99_8: tacceti prādhānyam / tasyeti harasya / kalpitārthasyeti vistāritakṛtrimatvamātravācino
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99_10: guṇāntaralābha iti vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇasya vācyāvacanasya parihārāt / mātreti evaṃ kṛtam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99_11: ity atra karaṇam / niṣka ābharaṇaviśeṣaḥ / vibhaktyanvayeti śrūyamāṇāyā vibhakter
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99_12: ity arthaḥ / tathā ca ṣaṣṭhyā ākrośe iti jñāpakam rūpakam upadeśa iṣyata iti pramāṇāntareṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99_13: loko vedas tathādhyātmaṃ pramāṇaṃ trividham ity uktarūpeṇa siddhau yau svasya viśeṣaṇasyotkarṣāpakarṣau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99_14: tadādhāyinām arthād viśeṣyaṃ pratīty arthaḥ / ārthaṃ vāstavam / alukam āha ṣaṣṭhyā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99_15: ākrośe ity anena / cintyam iti / etadavagamāya vicāryam ity arthaḥ / samāse ca vibhaktilopād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99_16: iti / iha hi vibhaktiśravaṇāśravaṇe vā anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ viśeṣaṇagatayor vāstavayoḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99_17: prayojakatāṃ bhajete / te tu prāyeṇa vākyasamāsagatatvenopalabhyamāne samāsasya vibhaktyaśravaṇād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99_18: vidheyāvimarśatām utpādayataḥ / ata eva samāse 'pi yadi vibhaktiḥ śrūyate, tadā na
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:99_19: vidheyāvimarśo yathā dāsyāḥ kāmuka ityādau / samāsas tu tatraikapadyādiprayojanatvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_0: evaṃ ca saptaprakāraṃ tatpuruṣaṃ nirūpyāvyayībhāvaṃ nirūpayati - avyayībhāva iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_1: samāpaṃ viśeṣyaṃ prati dayitasyeti yad viśeṣaṇaṃ tat tasya samīpasyeti yojanā / madhyevyometi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_2: pāre madhye ṣaṣṭhyā vā ity avyayībhāvaḥ / sa ceti prakarṣaḥ / evam iyatā dvandvavarjaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_3: samāsavṛttir vicāritā / idānīm atideśamukhena kṛttaddhitavṛttir nirūpyate anenaivetyādinā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_4: vivakṣāviśeṣād ity akārapraśleṣaḥ / sarvaṃ kaṣatīti sarvakūlābhrakarīreṣu kaṣaḥ iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_5: khaco 'yaṃ viṣayaḥ / bibhartti yaḥ iti kukṣiṃbhariś ca iti nipātitasya kukṣimbhariśabdasyāyaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_6: gocaraḥ / vidhun tud iti vidhvaruṣos tud iti khaśpratyayasthānam / śīrṣacchedam iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_7: śīrṣacchedād yac ca iti taddhitasya yat pratyayasyedaṃ padam / tair iti kaṣaṇādibhiḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_8: sarvārthasyeti, kāyopalakṣaṇasya kukṣer iti, vidhoś ceti vyakta sthitaḥ utkarṣam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_9: ādadhatāṃ prādhānyena vivakṣety atra sāmastyena yojanīyam / śīrṣacchedasya ceti utkarṣam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_10: ādadhataḥ prādhānyena vivakṣeti saṃbandhanīyam / pūrvebhyo 'sya pṛthaṅnirdeśas taddhitavṛttiviṣayatvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_11: bhinnajātīyatvāt / atra ca sarvārthādīnāṃ caturṇām utkarṣādhāne samanantaranirdiṣṭa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_12: bhuvanābhayetyādicatuṣṭayaṃ krameṇa hetutvena draṣṭavyam / tad apīti caritam / kaṣaṇādikartṛṣv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_13: iti khalaudarikarāhuṣv ity arthaḥ / rāmo 'smi sarvaṃ saha iti / pūssarvayor dārisahoḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_14: iti khaco 'yaṃ viṣayaḥ / daśarathasya hi prasūtir asāv iti tasyāpatyam iti stracpratyaye
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_15: taddhite kṛte dāśarathiśabdasyāyaṃ gocaraḥ / vākye tu yady apīti tad uktam - kriyāpradhānaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_16: guṇavad ekārthaṃ vākyam iṣyate iti / anya iti vakṣyamānanyāyena śabdakṛtasāmarthyoktiḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_17: sa iti pradhānabhāvenety atra nirdiṣṭaḥ pradhānabhāvaḥ śabdārthasāmarthyavivakṣākṛtānāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_18: trayāṇām apīti śabdakṛtaṃ śabdasaṃskāramahimnā niṣpannaṃ yathā karmadhārayād uttarapadasya /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_19: arthasāmarthyakṛtaṃ vastuvṛttaniṣpāditaṃ yathā grahaṃ saṃmārṣṭītyādau grahādeḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_20: tasya saṃskāryatvena vastutaḥ prādhānyam / vivakṣākṛtaṃ prayoktṛyadṛcchāpratipāditaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_21: yad anyasyotkarṣāpakarṣādhānatayā vivakṣitaṃ yathā rāmasya pāṇir asi ityādau rāmādeḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_22: tatra triṣu prādhānyeṣu vivakṣākṛtam eva grādhānyaṃ pradhānam / tatkṛtatvāt kāvyārthacamatkārasya /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_23: ata evoktaṃ tayoḥ samaśīrṣikābhāvād iti / tayor iti śabdārthasāmarthyakṛtayoḥ vivakṣākṛtena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_24: sahety arthāt / nanu pūrvaṃ śābdasyaiva prādhānyasya vaivakṣikatvam uktam anyasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_25: tu vāstavatvam / tat katham iha śābdavaivakṣikayor anyatvam ucyate / anyatve vā prādhānyatrayapratipādane
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_26: 'rthasāmarthyakṛtavivakṣākṭayoḥ ko viśeṣaḥ / śabdakṛtād dhi prādhānyād anyadarthasāmarathyakṛtam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_27: ucyate / tena vivakṣākṛtasya uktatvāt / tat kim arthasāmarthyakṛtam avaśiṣyata iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_28: naiṣa doṣaḥ / pūrvaṃ hi śābdikaikagocarasya śābdikavivakṣākṛtatvād vaivakṣikatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_29: anyasya tu kavigocarasya vāstavatvaṃ tad evārthatvam / iha punaḥ sahṛdayaikagocarasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_30: kavivivakṣāvaśād vaivakṣikatvam ucyate / śābdikaikaviṣayasya śābdatvam ity apekṣābhedāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_31: pūrvas tāvan na virodhaḥ / yad api prādhānyatrayapratipādane 'rthasāmarthyavivakṣākṛtayor
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_32: bheda uktas tatrāyaṃ bhāvaḥ - iha śābdaṃ vāstavaṃ ceti dvividham eva prādhānyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_35: vāstavam eva vivakṣākṛta pratipāditam / tathā ca grahaṃ saṃmārṣṭīti vaidikaṃ vivakṣānapekṣam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_36: arthasāmarthyakṛtasyodāharaṇaṃ dattam iti viṣayavibhāgavyavasthiter na dvitīyo 'pi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_37: virodha iti samañjasaṃ sarvam / evaṃ kṛttaddhitavṛttiviṣaye ātideśikaṃ guṇapradhānabhāvaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_38: vicārya samāsagatatvenaupadeśikaṃ prakṛtam anusandhatte tad idam atreti / sarūpāṇām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_39: iti dvandvasamāsasamānanyāyatvād ekaśeṣavṛttir api svīkṛtā / viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvābhāve
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_40: 'pīti samāsoṭṭaṅkanikāyāṃ prāyagrahaṇaprayojanaṃ prakāśayati / rūpaṃ ca kāntiś ca
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_42: rūpam ityādau hi gamyamānabhavanakriyāpekṣaṃ rūpādīnāṃ kartṛtvam / etena tatpuruṣasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_43: kartrudāharaṇaprastāve kartrādīnāṃ kārakāṇām anekeṣām iti yad uktaṃ, tat samīhitam.
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_44: kaś ca kaś ceti / atraikaśeṣo na kṛtaḥ / kṛtaikaśeṣam iti kāv iti prayoge / adhunā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_45: pradhānetarabhāvāpattiṃ darśayati yatra punar iti / bhavata iti ripustrīṇāṃ saṃbandhitvena,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_46: ripustrīṇām iti stanayugasya saṃbandhitveneti yojanā / ripustrīṇām iti samāsasyodāharaṇam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_47: na cātra saṃbandhamātrād atiriktaṃ pratīyate / tadartham eveti upamotprekṣādayo 'py
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_48: alaṅkārāḥ upamotprekṣādīnām utkarṣam apakarṣaṃ vā pratipādayituṃ vidhīyante / anyathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_49: tadviracanaṃ niṣprayojanaṃ syāt / tau vidheyeti / utkarṣāpakarṣau / samāsa iti sā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_50: samāsa iti vivakṣā parāmṛśyate / vaidarbhīti yady api vāmanamate asamāsā pāñcālī,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_51: madhyamasamāsā tu vaidarbhī, tathāpi matāntare viparyayaḥ sthita iti tadabhiprāyeṇehāsamāsā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_52: vaidarbhī kathitā / kārikāmadhya eva saṃbandhamātrapratītau samāsasyodāharaṇam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_53: ūrdhvākṣitāpeti / atra caturthapādaikaśeṣadeśayuktasya pādatrayasya samāse saṃbandhamātraṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_54: pratīyate, notkarṣāpakarṣau / vākyāt tūbhayam iti ubhayaṃ saṃbandharūpam utkarṣāpakarṣarūpaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_55: ca vastv ity arthaḥ / atrodāharaṇaṃ me yadaraya iti samāse hi madaraya iti syāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_56: na cāsmād atiśayaḥ pratītaḥ / nanu padād uttarapadayor yuṣmadasmadoḥ temayāv ekavacanasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_57: iti temayāv ādeśāv uktau / na cātra padāt paro 'smacchabdaḥ / evaśabdaḥ padam iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_58: cen na / tatprayoge nacavāhāhaivayukte iti niṣedhād bhinnavākyagatatvāc ca / samānavākye
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_59: hi nighātayuṣmadasmadādeśāḥ / etenaiva vyatiriktaṃ padāntaraṃ pratyuktam / utkarṣamātram
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_60: eva śabdādeśaḥ atra ke cid āhuḥ vākye tāvad rasapratītir nirvyūḍhā / tām anupamaradayan
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_61: kāvye yady asādhuśabdo 'pi syān na tadā sthūlaḥ kaś cid doṣaḥ / kāvye hi rasapratītiḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:100_62: pradhānam / tadanirvāhe kāvyam eva na syāt / apaśabdaprayoge tu lakṣaṇāsmaraṇamātram /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:101: nīrasas tu prabandho yaḥ so 'paśabdo mahān kaveḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_0: iti / anye tv āhuḥ / bhavatu rasāpekṣayāpaśabdasya svalpadoṣatvaṃ, tathāpi mahākavīnām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_1: apaśabdaprayogo mahān doṣaḥ / tenātra temeśabdau nipāteṣv iti tādṛśo vibhaktipratirūpako
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_2: meśabdo nipāto, yathā ahantā ahaṃyur ityādāv ahaṃśabdaḥ / tataś ca nātra kaś cid
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_3: viśeṣa iti / kiṃ sarvātmanā karaṇasya duṣṭatvam eva / nety āha kin tv iti / etasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_4: samāsasya / antareṇeti vīraraudrādeḥ samāsena prakāśyatvāt / vṛttaṃ vasantatilakādi /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_5: vṛttayaḥ kaiśikyādyāḥ upanāgarikādyāś ca / kākuḥ kākvadhyāyalakṣito dhvanivikārarūpo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_6: vā / vācikābhinayo vāgvikārarūpo 'nubhāvaḥ / ardhāntāvadhir iti ślokāpekṣayā ardham
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_7: antāvadhiḥ / nyūneti padyāpekṣayā nyūnaṃ rasābhivyaktihetutvam ity arthaḥ / yathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_8: pūrvokta iti ūrdhvākṣitāpetyādau / samāso 'rdhāntāvadhiḥ kāryo nādhika ity anena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_9: vyāvartyasyādhikasya tad udāharaṇam / tasyeti padārthānāṃ parasparasaṃbandhaś cen
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_10: na cchidyate tadā tasya samāsasya madhye vicchedo na kārya ity arthaḥ / avyabhicārād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_11: iti vidheyatvaṃ hi prādhānyāvinābhāvaḥ / sneham iti / atra pānādīnām prakāśanasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_12: ca vidhyanuvādalopitvaikakartṛkāṇāṃ prādhānyabhāvo nāpasmṛtam atra ca yo 'yam iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_13: yacchabdena dīpasya padārthasya parāmarśopakrame tattamasa iti tacchabdena vākyārthasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_14: parāmarśo duṣṭa ity upapāditaṃ prāk / śaktiḥ sāmarthyam āyudhabhedaś ca / tārakāḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_15: jyotīṃṣi daityaviśeṣaś ca tārakaḥ / adho nistejastvena vāhanatvena ca / śikhīvahnir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_16: mayūraś ca / candrasya suvarṇasya saṃbandhī kāntāvabhāso lasan dedīpyamāno yasmin /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_17: candrakāṇāṃ mecakānām avabhāso lasanaṃ sphurad yasya / andhakāre tamasi andhakārer
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_18: harasya / guhaḥ kumāraḥ / apara iveti atrāparaśabdasāmarthyād bhūpe dvitīyaguhatvapratītau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_19: vastutas tadasaṃbhave tatsaṃbhāvanāyām utprekṣā / aparaśabdābhāve tu svasvarūpasthitasyaiva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_20: vāstavasya guhasya pratītāv iyam upamā syāt / evam apara iva pākaśāsano, maurvīṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_21: dvitīyām ityādau ca mantavyam / aharpater iti / aharādīnāṃ patyādiṣu iti vacanād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_22: rephaḥ / atra dhāraṇādīnāṃ guṇabhāvaḥ / ādhārasya tu prādhānyam / karttā hi guṇakriyā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_23: niṣpādayan pradhānakriyām aidamparyeṇa niṣpādayati, na tu tāsv aidamparyam / yatra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_24: sarvāsv aidamparyaṃ tatra bhavaty eva sarvāsām ākhyātavācyatvam / yathā saudhād ityādi /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_25: itarad aprādhānyam / ādyā pradhānabhūtā / aparā aprādhānyavatī / bahulagrahaṇam iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_26: viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyeṇa bahulam ity atra / kva cid ityādi / kva cit pravṛttiḥ kva cid
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_27: apravṛttir iti bahulagrahaṇaprayojanasya vyavasthitatvāt / utargeti samāsavidhiḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_28: sāmānyarūpatvād utsargaḥ prādhānyādivivakṣānimittaś ca tatpratiṣedho viśeṣarūpatvād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_29: apavādaḥ / apavādasyaiveti / apavādaviṣayaparihāreṇotsargasya pravṛttir iti nyāyāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_30: kartum aśakya iti / avyavasthitaviṣayatvāt / yathā utsargasya ghañy amanuṣye bahulam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_31: ity atra / pariśabde tv ayaṃ bhavati / parivādaḥ parīvāda iti / vivāda ity atra naiva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_32: bhavati / tadviṣayaḥ syād iti kṛtyalyuṭo bahulam ityādigatasya bahulagrahaṇasya vidhyanuvādabhāvaviṣaye
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_33: sāmarthyābhāvāt samāsābhāva iti bhāvaḥ / tadabhiprāyam iti ācāryābhiprāyam / sāpekṣatāmidīti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_34: ṛddhasya rājñaḥ puruṣa ityādau / tat samarthagrahaṇam / etadvyāvṛttīti etacchabdena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_35: pradhānetarabhāvaḥ parāmṛṣṭaḥ / tasyehārthatvam apīti samarthagrahaṇaṃ pradhānetarabhāvaviṣayanivṛttyartham
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_36: apīty arthaḥ / vidheyoddeśyeti uddeśyo 'trordhvanirdeśārhatvād anuvādyaḥ / yat teneti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_37: yacchabdaḥ pūrvārthasaṃbaddhaḥ / tenāpāraṇena / anabhidhānaṃ veti abhidhānalakṣaṇā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:103_38: hi kṛttaddhitasmāsā iti / samarthagrahaṇaṃ ca veti / caśabdo 'trātiriktaḥ, samuccayavikalpayor
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:104: dṛṣṭir nāmṛtavarṣiṇī smitamadhuprasyandi vaktraṃ na tan nārdrārdraṃ hṛdayaṃ na candanarasasparśāni cāṅgāni vā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:105_0: ity atra cavāśabdadvayaṃ pratyuktaṃ, cavāśabdārthayor ekatra virodhāt / khaṇḍiketi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:105_1: khaṇḍo granthasaṃbandhī na tu samasto granthaḥ / sa vidyate yeṣām / anavagatatadabhiprāyair
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:105_2: iti samarthagrahaṇaṃ praty ācāryasya hi tair abhiprāyo nāgataḥ / abhidhānādhānoddhāreti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:105_3: abhidhānānāṃ śabdānām ādhānam abhinavānāṃ nyasanam / uddhāraḥ pūrvakāṇām uddharaṇam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:105_4: śālīnā adhṛṣṭā avicārakā ity arthaḥ / aparam apīti punaruktādikam / taccinteti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:105_7: samāso na karttavyaḥ / yathā rāmasya pāṇir asi iti / prakaraṇaśabdādisakha iti pāṭhe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:105_8: śabdasyānyasya sannidhir iti svīkṛtam / yadā prakaraṇakākvādisakha iti pāṭhaḥ, tadā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:105_9: kākugrahaṇena svaraviśeṣa ucyate yaḥ kālo vyaktisvarādayaḥ iti kāvyagatatvena svīkṛtaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:105_11: guṇapradhānabhāvavivakṣāṃ mahatā prapañcena parighaṭayya prakṛtodāraṇe ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣagatatvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:105_12: yojayitum āha ittham avasthita iti / ambikāyā upādānam iti saṃbandhaḥ / tat kim iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:105_13: viśeṣaṇasyānyakesarivyāvṛttir vā, kesarigataprakarṣapratipādanaṃ vā phalam / ādye
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:105_14: pakṣe nirdiṣṭacamatkārasambhāvanā / dvitīye tu samāsānupapattir iti tātparyam / vivakṣitapadaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:105_15: camatkārātiśayapadena yojanīyam / tasyā ity ambikāyās sakāśāt / jātyantaraṃ viśiṣṭāvāntarakesarijātiḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:105_16: tayāvacchinno viśiṣṭaḥ / viśiṣṭa eveti lokottaraḥ / mohantv iti harer vihaṅgamo garuḍaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:105_17: moham ajñānaṃ hantv ity arthaḥ / garuḍajātyavacchinna iti / saugatadṛśā garuḍānāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:105_18: bahutvād iti bhāvaḥ / vihaṅgamaviśeṣatvaṃ tu jātyādivailakṣaṇyāt / svābhiprāyāviṣkaraṇam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:105_19: iti / sādṛśyamūlayāprastutapraśaṃsayeti bhāvaḥ / tasyāś ceti tacchabdena sarasvatī
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:105_20: parāmṛṣṭā / sarasvatyā ambikā pratibimbam ātmanaś ca kesarīty arthaḥ / dvitīyapakṣa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_0: samāsād asāv iti ambikākesariśabdād unmiṣaty eva sa camatkāra ity arthaḥ / udayāstamayeti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_1: vṛttau camatkārasyāstamaya vākye udaya iti cūlikākrameṇa yogaḥ / upadarśitam eva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_2: prāg iti udāharaṇapratyudāharaṇapradarśanadvāreṇa / iṣṭaṃ hīti abhipretasyāprāptir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_3: yā, sā codanārhā iṣṭam etan na sidhyatīti / yat tu nābhipretaṃ tasyāprāptir bhūṣaṇaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_4: na tu dūṣaṇam ity arthaḥ / asmābhir asāv iti asau camatkāraḥ / sā bhrāntir eveti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_5: nirvikalpavikalpabhedena dvividhā bhrāntiḥ / tatrādyā timirādyupaplutendriyasya dvicandrādipratītirūpā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_6: dvitīyā tv abhimānarūpā śuktirajatādipratītisvarūpā / seti camatkārāvagatiḥ / vyākhyāvākyād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_7: eveti ambikāyāḥ kesarīti samāsavivaraṇavākyāt / teṣām iti pratītivaicitryānabhyupagamavādinām /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_8: tatrāropiteti tatra samāse śuktisthānīye rajatam ivāropitāvāstavīty arthaḥ / udayāstamayapakṣau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_9: kramād vākyasamāsagatau / udyoga iti / saṃrambhapadaṃ nirasyodyogapadakaraṇaṃ prakramyamānodyuktavat
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_10: padakramābhedāya / yo 'sāv ity adaḥśabdaḥ prasiddhiparāmarśakaḥ yacchabdapratinirdeśasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_11: tacchabdena kariṣyamāṇatvāt / pratipāditeti / ārtho hi kevalatacchabdasya prayoganibandhana
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_12: upakramopasaṃhārakramaḥ pratipādita eva / rajaś chaleneti / chalevaśabdaprayoge sāpahnaveyam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_13: utprekṣā / kevalacchalaśabdaprayoge 'py apahnutiḥ / kevalevaśabdaprayoge ca sambhāvanapratītāv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_14: utprekṣā / dvayaprayoge tu śabalā pratītiḥ / na cātrāpahnutyutprekṣayoḥ saṅkaraḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_15: utprekṣā hy apahnutyavinābhāvinī / so 'pahnavaḥ kva cid garbhīkṛto yathā nakhakṣatānīva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_16: vanasthalīnām ity atra, na palāśāni, kin tu sambhāvayāmi nakhakṣatānīti pratīteḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_17: kva cit tu śabdena pratipādyate yathā adhyāruroheveti / evaṃ cāsyā apahnutyavinābhāvinyā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_18: apahnutibādhakatvaṃ, na tayā saha saṅkaraḥ / bhinnavākyatāyām eveti / tatra hi vidhyanuvādabhāva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_19: āñjasyena krameṇa pratīyate / tad eva veti viśeṣaṇam / tac ca vidhyanuvādabhāvavivakṣāyāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_20: vidheyam / anyatreti / utkarṣāparṣayor vidheyatvasya cābhāve / kāmacāra iti samāsāsamāsayoḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_21: tadartham iti utkarṣādiviṣaye samāsaniṣedhārtham / sāpekṣeti sāpekṣam asamarthaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_22: bhavatīty etāvanmātrapratītaye / pitroḥ svateveti yathā pitarau vandanīyāv iti nityasaṃbandhanyāyād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_23: nijāv eva pitarau pratīyete, tadvat sāpekṣāṇām anabhidhānākhyena nyāyena samāsābhāvaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:106_24: pratyeṣyate / svatā ātmīyatvam iva / sā doṣaprakāranivṛttiḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:107_0: adhunā svotkarṣaśālitāprakaṭanārthaṃ svapariśramaṃ piṇḍīkṛtya ślokena darśayitum
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:107_1: āha kāvyakāñcaneti / kāvyam eva parīkṣaṇīyatvāt suvarṇaṃ tatra parīkṣāsthānaṃ nikaṣopalam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:107_2: ātmānaṃ manyate, na punar uktakrameṇa parāmarthas san nikaṣopalaḥ / ata eva kuntakeneti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:107_3: khyātasyāpy ulluṇṭhanavacanam / śloka eṣa iti / yaḥ sarvasāratayā pradarśitas tatreyatī
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:107_4: dūṣaṇavṛṣṭir muktā / tatrānyasya granthasya kā gaṇeneti sūcitam / nidarśitaḥ sthālīpulākanyāyenodāhṛtaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:107_5: atra śloke vakṣyamāṇaitadīyanyāyānusāreṇa kaṣeṇa niyamena kāñcanākṣepāt kāñcanapadaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:107_7: vidheyatvāt samāsakaraṇaṃ vidheyāvimarśadūṣitaṃ ke cid ācakṣate vicakṣaṇāḥ / tattvenaiva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:107_8: granthakṛtā svakṛtiṣv ayantrita ityādinā dattottaram eva / asya ca vidheyāvimarśasyānantetaraprasiddhalakṣyapātitvenāsmābhir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:107_9: nāṭakamīmāṃsāyāṃ sāhityamīmāṃsāyāṃ ca teṣu teṣu sthāneṣu prapañcaḥ pradarśita iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:108_0: evaṃ vidheyāvimarśaṃ prakāravaicitryeṇa lakṣayitvā prakramabhedaṃ lakṣayitum āha
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:108_2: utkhāto viṣamonnataḥ pradeśaḥ / enam iti śabdārthavyavahāram / tadviṣayabhāvaḥ prakramabhedaviṣayatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:108_3: anabhibhāṣaṇaṃ tatkartṛkabhāṣaṇābhāvaḥ / evam anālapanaṃ jñeyam / analam asamarthā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:108_4: vidhyanuvādabhāvaprakāratopagamād iti prakāraḥ sādṛśyam / upakrāntaṃ hy anuvādasthānīyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:108_5: nirvāhakaṃ ca vidheyaprakhyam / tatra spaṣṭaṃ vidheyānuvādyaprakāram udāharati yatheti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:109: tadā jāyante guṇā yadā tais sahṛdayair gṛhyante /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:111: evam eva janas tasyā dadāti kapolopamāyāṃ śaśibimbam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:112: paramārthavicāre punaś candraś candra iva varākaḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:113_0: utkarṣāpakarṣamātreti kamalānām utkarṣavivakṣā / candrasya punar apakarṣavivakṣā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:113_1: ata evodāharaṇadvayaṃ dattam / prakramabhedaprakāra iti prakāro 'tra viśeṣaḥ / paryāyaprakrameti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:113_2: candraśabdārthasya śaśiśabdena paryāyāntaranirdeśo na yukto vakṣyamāṇaprakramabhedaprasaṅgāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:113_3: na caivam iti tenaiva śabdenopasaṃhāra ity arthaḥ / tayor iti prakramabhedapunaruktayoḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:113_4: asyeti prakramābhedasya parāmarśaḥ / tatra hi yathoddeśaṃ pratinirdeśe na paunaruktyam,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:113_5: aikarasyena pratītiprasaraṇāt / uddeśyapratinirdeśyabhāvo na paunaruktyasya viṣayaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:114: kṣāmāṅgyaḥ kṣatakomalāṅguligaladraktaiḥ sadarbhāḥ sthalīḥ pādaiḥ pātitayāvakair iva galadbāṣpāmbudhautānanāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_0: iti / atra galacchabdadvayaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ yathoddeśaṃ pratinirdeśo 'sya viṣaya iti samañjasam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_1: [tayor iti prakramābhedapaunaruktyayoḥ / asyeti prakramābhedasya parāmarśaḥ /] nanu
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_2: vrajataḥ kva tāta! vajasīty atra vrajinā prakrame vajinā ca nirvāhe kathaṃ na prakramabhedaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_3: vajatir api dhātur asti / vaja vraja gatāv iti pāṭhād ity āśaṅkyoktaṃ vrajata iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_4: uditaṃ śiśuneti uditam ity asya viśeṣaṇaṃ paricayagatārtham iti / asphuṭam iti ca /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_5: bhāve cātra pratyayaḥ / kāryārthaṃ pathi gacchataḥ paścān nāmodīraṇaṃ viruddham iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_6: śiśunā lalitavacasā nāmany udīrite jananyāsya bhartsanaṃ kṛtam iti tato 'sya manyur
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_7: vivṛddha ity atra tātparyārthaḥ / evaṃ dhāturūpāyāḥ prkṛte prakramabhedaṃ pradarśya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_8: saṃprati prātipadikarūpāyās tasyā madhye ca sarvanāmādīnāṃ prakāravaicitryeṇa taṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_9: darśayati sarvanāmeti / kva cit punaḥ pustakeṣu prakṛtiprakramabhedād anantaraṃ pratyayaprakramabhedodāharaṇaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_10: tat paścāt sarvanāmaprakramabhedanirdeśo dṛśyate / tatra ca prkṛter anantaraṃ pratyayasyaiva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_11: nirdeśa ucita iti sa eva kathita iti saṅgatiḥ / tataḥ paraṃ prakṛtiviśeṣāṇāṃ pratyayaviśeṣāṇāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_12: tatsamudāyānāṃ ca tatprakramabhedo nirūpayiṣyate / uktarītyeti / yas tv ekavākye
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_13: kartṛtvenokto yaś cedamādibhir ity atroktena krameṇety arthaḥ / nanu yacchabdena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_14: prakrame tacchabdenedamādibhir vā prakrame yacchabdena vā katham upasaṃhāra ity āha
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_15: na caivam iti / anyonyāpekṣe iti / yattador nityābhisaṃbandha ity uktam / evaṃ tacchabdādūraviprakṛṣṭārtheṣv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_16: idamādiṣu prāg ukte yo 'vikalpam ityādau jñeyam / teneti prakṛtopasaṃhāraḥ / idamādīnāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_17: parasparāvāntaravaicitrye 'pi sthūladṛṣṭyā ekārthatvam / atra hīti atra hi kartṛviśeṣaṇadvāreṇaikasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_18: hetutvam aparasya sākṣād iti prakramabhedaḥ / yaśodhigantum iti atra hi tṛtīyātumunoḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_19: pratītivaiṣamyajanakatvam / vāśabdasyeti / vakṣyati hi tulyakakṣyatayā yatra padārthāḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_20: iti / apatyavato 'pīti yuktaḥ pāṭha iti / atra ke cit samarthayante - viśeṣataḥ snihyanto
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_21: dṛśyante tat putraśabdasyāpatyaviśeṣavācitve apatyaśabdasya ca sāmānyavācitve 'pi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_22: sarvanāmavaśād viśeṣaparyavasāne bhavaty eva prakṛtārthaparipoṣa iti / tad etad asya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_23: granthakārasya hṛdayam anālokyaiva, yasmād dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikabhāvenātra vākyārthadvayam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_24: upanibaddham / tatra ca dvayor bimbapratibimbabhāvena nirdeśo yujyate / dṛṣṭānte
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_25: cātra sāmānyopakramaḥ, viśeṣopasaṃhāraḥ, puṣpaśabdasya sāmānyavācitvāc cūtaśabdasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_27: viśeṣopakramaḥ / sāmānyopasaṃhāraḥ / sarvanāmavaśād vā viśeṣāntaranirdeśo nyāyyaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_28: sthitapāṭhe putraśabdasya viśeṣavācitvam apatyaśabdasya sāmānyavācino viśeṣaparyavasānam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_29: yadā tv apatyavato 'pīti pāṭhas tadāsya sāmānyopakramo viśeṣopasaṃhāraḥ / dvitīyasyāpatyaśabdasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_30: sarvanāmasaṃbandhena viśeṣaparyavasānād yathaikīyamate tasminn adrau kati cid balety
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_31: atra / api śabdasyārthasaṅgatiś ced dṛśyeva bhrājate / yasya naivāpatyasaṃbandhas
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_32: tasya mā bhūt kanyāyām ekasyām atṛptiḥ yasya tv anekāpatyayogas tasya katham ekasminn
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_33: apatye snigdhatvam iti vismayaḥ / etadartha evāpiśabdo jīvati / atṛptikāraṇatvaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_34: ca kanyāyāḥ parasamarpaṇīyatvena / guṇagauraveṇa ca snehapātratā / etadartham asyāś
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_35: cūtena pratibimbanam / tad ittham apatyavato 'pīty eṣa eva pāṭhaḥ śreyān / samāsānupapattīti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_36: adhikaṃ na tu taddhānir iti nyāyena guṇāntaralābha ity arthaḥ / varaṃ kṛteti / kṛtāḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_37: śikṣitāḥ santo dhvastā naṣṭā guṇā yasya / amaṇir avidyamānamaṇir alaṅkāraḥ / upalaśabdenātra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_38: maṇir eva vivakṣitaḥ / tannātra maṇiśabdaḥ prayukta iti paryāyaprakramabhedatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_39: kham iveti / haṃsaś candra iva candra iva haṃsa iti yuktaḥ pāṭhaḥ / maghona indrasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_40: sute 'rjune / vīryaṃ ca vidvatsv iti / vīryavedanaṃ cety eva hetutvena vivakṣitam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_41: samuccayo vikalpo veti / vikalpo yaśo 'dhigantum ity atrodāhṛtaḥ / samuccayasya tv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_42: idaṃ vīryaṃ cety udāharaṇam / vidvatsu vīryaṃ tanaye iti pāṭhe na vedanaṃ hetutvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_43: vivakṣitam, api tu vastusvarūpapratipādanaparatvenety ayaṃ manyate / evaṃ ca vidvatsv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_44: iti viśeṣaṇasya nairarthakyam āpadyata iti nānena vicāritam / duṣkūlabhāva iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_46: caturthe pāde / kapālam evāmalaśekharaśrīr ity atra kapālānāṃ bahutve vācye yad ekatvavacanam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_47: amalaśekharaśrīr ity atra ca śekharamātre dharmiṇi vaktavye yacchekharaśrīr iti dharmavacanaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_48: tad anupapannam eva gantavyam / evaṃ ca pūrvokteṣu vakṣyamāṇeṣu codāharaṇeṣu saṃbhavann
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_49: api vicāro granthavistarabhayān na niravaśeṣatayā kṛta iti tatraivābhiyogaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_50: tadupetam iti / svaśabdena sarvanāmnā vā nirdeśas tulyaphala iti pratipādayiṣyamāṇatvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_51: bhagavati yuṣmatprasādeneti / anena nyāyena paśyata mātaḥ iti vārttike dharmakīrteḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_52: prayogaḥ pratyuktaḥ / prādhānyābhāvād ity uktam iti / yatraikakartṛkānekā prādhānyetarabhāk
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_53: kriyā ity atra / anenijur akṣālayan / jakṣur akhādan / bisaprasūnaṃ padmam / nejanādāv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_54: iti liṭā bhūtānadyatanaparokṣaprakrame anenijur iti tu bhūtānadyatanena nirvāhaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_55: tathā dhṛtavikāsīty atra bhūtamātre ktapratyaya ity atrāpi kālaprakramabhedaḥ / tatropari
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_56: tiṅantaprakramabhedo dvitīyo 'tra na sthitaḥ / evaṃ cehādigrahaṇena dhṛtavikāsīti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_57: gṛhyate / anenijur iti atra vikacam asya dadhuḥ prasūnam iti samādhānaṃ na kṛtaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_58: prakārāntareṇa samarthayiṣyamāṇatvāt / yadi vetyādināmuṃ prakramabhedaṃ nirākaroti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_59: ajayad iti atra parokṣo 'pi jayo darśanārhatvāt parokṣatvena na vivakṣita iti liṭprayogo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_60: na kṛtaḥ / vidyamānasyāsyāvivakṣāyāṃ dṛṣṭāntam āha anudarā kanyeti / na hi kasyāś
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:115_61: cit kanyāyā udarābhāvaḥ kṛśatvāt punas tad api vivakṣyate / evaṃ ca -
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:116: abhūdabhūmiḥ pratipakṣajanmanāṃ bhiyāṃ tanūjas tapanadyutir diteḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:117: yam indraśabdārthaniṣūdanaṃ harer hariṇyapūrvaṃ kaśipuṃ pracakṣate // ityādeḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:118: tāta tvaṃ nijatejasaiva gamitaḥ svargaṃ yadi svasti te kiṃ tv anyena hṛtā vadhūr iti kathāṃ mā sakhyur agre kṛthāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:119: rāmo 'haṃ yadi rāghavas tad akhilaṃ vrīḷānamatkandharaṃ sārdhaṃ bandhujanena sendravijayī vaktā svayaṃ rāvaṇaḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:120_0: ityādeś ca mahataḥ kāvyapravāhasya na kiṃ cid duṣṭatvam / arthasyeti tadbhāvo 'rthatvaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:120_1: sattā atadbhāva asattvam / yatreti pūrvārdhaśeṣaḥ / yatheti / na prakramabheda ity
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:120_2: anvayaḥ / tatra kālaviśeṣo darśitaḥ / yathā bhūtasya bhāvinaś ca kālasyādyatanānadyatanatve
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:120_3: parokṣāparokṣatve ca vaivakṣike eveti / te śīlādayo 'rthāḥ ā kves tacchīlataddharmatatsādhukāriṣu
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:120_4: ity atra nirdiṣṭāḥ / teṣāṃ ca vaivkṣike sattvāsattve / evaṃ ca kva cit tācchīlikādipratyayaprayoge
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:122: agṛdhnur ādade so 'rtham asaktaḥ sukham anvabhūt //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_0: ity atrāgṛdhnur iti tācchīlyādyarthapratyayaprayoge 'py atrasta ity atrātrasnur ity
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_1: akaraṇe 'pi na duṣṭatvam atrasnur iti vā nirdeśe agṛdhnur iti nirdoṣam eva / kartuḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_2: phalavattā kartrabhiprāyatvam / tad api vaivakṣikam eva / evaṃ ca dṛṣṭā dṛṣṭim adho
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_3: dadāti kurute nālāpam ābhāṣitā ity atra yadi kartrabhiprāyatvaṃ kriyāphalasya, tadā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_4: dadātīti parasmaipadānupapattiḥ / na cet tadā kuruta ity atra parasmaipadaprasaṅga
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_5: iti prakramabhedaparyanuyogo niravakāśa eva / evam anyatra boddhavyam / tena te iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_6: te kālaviśeṣādayaḥ tena vivakṣāprayuktatvena kāraṇena na darśitā ity arthaḥ / gāhantām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_7: iti / atra kartur ākhyātenābhidhānaṃ karmaṇaś cānabhidhānaṃ prakrāntaṃ visrabdhair
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_8: ity anyathākṛtam iti kārakaprakramabhedaḥ / vihṛtiṃ viharaṇaṃ bhaṅgibhājanatvam ity
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_9: arthaḥ / vivṛtam iti pāṭhe vistaraśālitvam ity arthaḥ / ratau vigraho virodhaḥ stanatair
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_10: vyavahitas tatprasādād virodhasya kartum aśakyatvāt / vitene iti bhāve pratyayaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_11: stanitāni vitatībhūtānīty arthaḥ / śābdaḥ prakramabheda iti śabdaviṣayatvāc chābdaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_12: śābdaprakramabheda iti tu prakṛtiprakramabhedasyānukrameṇa ye paṭhanti taiḥ śābdaś
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_13: cārthaś cottaro grantho nālocita ity upekṣyam etat / saṅgamabhūṣeti / atra buhuvrīhāv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_15: prakramabhedaḥ / evam ārthaḥ prakramabheda ity atra prathamaprakrāntabhidyamānārthaviṣayatvād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_16: ārtha iti vyākhyeyam / dhṛtavikāsīti pūrvaṃ kālaprakaraṇenodāhṛtam, saṃprati śābdaviṣayatvenodāhriyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_17: tiṅantagatatvenāpy ūhyate / na hīyam ārthaḥ prakramabheda iti atrodāharaṇadvitayaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_18: dattaṃ mattateti samatayeti / tatra mattatety atra saṅgamabhūṣety ārthena krameṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_19: prakramaḥ, bhūṣayatīty atra tu śābdarūpatayā pratinirdeśa ity ārthaḥ prakramabhedaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_20: kiṃ tu tadvapus tad api cārutaratvam iti pāṭhaḥ sthitaparipāṭhyānuguṇyābhāvān na
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_21: nyāyyaḥ / cārutā sa khalu sāpi śarīram iti tu pāṭhaḥ śreyān / evaṃ ca dayitasaṅgatir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_22: eṣety etacchabdaḥ paṭhanīyaḥ, na punar āsām iti pāṭhaḥ / tatra hi mattatā kena śabdena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_23: parāmṛśyate / samatayety etat prāyeṇādarśeṣu śābdaprakramabhede udāharaṇatayā dṛśyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_24: ārtha prakramabhedaprastāve vā? ca anantarodāharaṇayor ādyam āhitaviparyayam iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_25: pāṭhaḥ / etac cāyuktaṃ yojanagranthe varuṇasyārthaprakrama iti granthavirodhāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_26: kiṃ tu niyamayann iti vidagdhamanyatayā datto 'pi no hṛdayaṅgamaḥ pāṭhaḥ, varuṇenaiva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_27: tat saṃbaddham ity atra pramāṇābhāvāt / na hi varuṇasyānyopasarjanatvena sthitasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_28: svātantryam asti / tasya naivaṃvidhasaṃbandhaḥ puṣṭatvaṃ dhatte / ārthaprakramabhedaprastāve
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_29: idam evodāharaṇam āhitaviparyayam iti pāṭhaḥ śreyān / parihṛtau bhavata iti / vibhaktiprakramabhedacaśabdayor
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_30: dvitvād dvivacanam / caśabdasyobhayathā duṣṭatā ca / caśabdasya ca samuccayo viṣayaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_31: tadbhāvaḥ uktaḥ / yena tulyakakṣyatvābhāvākyatvena nivāritaḥ / prakramabhedas tv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_32: asatām ity asamuccetavyanikaṭaprayogāt / sa hi niyamanād ity asyānantaraṃ paṭhanīyaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_33: loṣṭasaṃcāra ekaikasya bhedasya bhedāntaraiḥ saha saṃyojanaprakārākhyo gaṇanāviśeṣaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_34: prakṛtipratyayayor iti laghuśabdaḥ prakṛtiḥ / tasyāṃ guruśabdena bhedaḥ / guruśabde
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_35: ceyasunn adhikaḥ prayukto, yo laghuśabde na prayuktaḥ / tatpratyayasya ca pratinirdeśo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_36: na kṛta iti pratyayaprakramabhedo 'pi / abhinavapāṭhe tu tatpratyayarahitasyaiva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_37: laghuśabdasya pratinirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ / krameti ya uddeśakramaḥ prakrāntaḥ, so 'nudeśe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_38: vaiparītyād na kṛta iti pratīter aikyasya vigamād duṣṭatvam / tava kusumaśaratvam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_39: iti / idaṃ kramaprakramabhedodāharaṇaṃ na yuktaṃ cūlikākramasyaivātrocitatvam / tathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_40: hy uddeśaḥ / smaraṃ prati sāṃmukhyenābhidhānaṃ vihāya nenduṃ prāsaṅgikaṃ pratyayathārthajñānam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_41: ucitam iti smarasya tāvat prathamanirdeśo nyāyyaḥ / anudeśe tv idaṃ viṣayaṃ tyaktvā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_42: na prāsaṅgikena vākyārthaparisamāptiḥ śobhate iti pāryavasānikena smareṇaiva saṃmukhīkriyamāṇena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_43: vākyārthaḥ parisamapanīya iti pāṭhakramāpekṣayā cūlikākrama eva sahṛdayahṛdayarañjaka
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_44: iti kuśāgrīyadhiṣaṇair nipuṇaṃ nirūpaṇīyam etat / tathā ca yuṣmadasmadoḥ padasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:123_45: padāt ṣaṣṭhīcaturthīdvitīyāsthayor vānnāvau iti cūlikākrameṇa vyavahāro dṛśyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:124: upādāyāpi ye heyās tān upāyān pracakṣate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_0: iti / prakramabheda iti / prakramabhedaviṣayasya vidhyanuvādabhāvaprakāratvāt prakramabhedo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_1: 'py upacārād vidhyanuvādaprakāra ity arthaḥ / anenaiva nyāyena śābdaś cārthaś ceti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_2: prakramabhedasya bhedadvayaṃ śābdārthaviṣayatvād boddhavyam / śabdabhedam iti / ekaśabdābhedatvābhidheyatvenārthasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_4: prakāreṇa vidhyanuvādabhāvaviṣayatvam / kāvyagatatvena hi cintā prastutā / na ca
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_5: kāvye śāstrādivad arthapratītyarthaṃ śabdamātraṃ prayujyate, sahitayoḥ śabdārthayos
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_6: tatra prayogāt / sāhityaṃ tulyakakṣyatvenānyūnānatiriktatvam / astv evam iti sāmānyena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_7: prakramabhedābhyupagamo viśeṣe tu paryanuyoga iti bhāvaḥ / prakramabhedaniyamaṃ pratīti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_8: hṛdayaṅgamaḥ pāṭhaḥ / yadbhedābhedābhyām iti hi yacchabdena prakramaḥ parāmṛśyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_9: prakramabhedaniyamaṃ pratīti tu pāṭhe yadbhedābhedābhyām iti prakramasyaivoddhṛtasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_10: yathākathaṃ cit parāmarśo vyākhyeyaḥ / śuci bhūṣayatīti / atra bhūṣayatīti śābdaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_11: bhūṣaṇaṃ prakrāntam alaṅkriyetyādāv ārthena rūpeṇa pratinirdiṣṭam / atra ca paryāyaprakramabhedaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_12: sthito 'pi sāṃprataṃ na cintitaḥ śabdārthaprakramabhedacintanaprastāvāt / atra vibhāgasyaiveti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_13: atra vety arthād upameyam tadabhisaṃbandhaḥ śabdābhisaṃbandhaḥ / viparyayād iti sākṣāc
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_14: chabdasaṃbandhābhāvāt / udāharaṇadvaye śuci bhūṣayati iti cārutā vapur iti ca / yādṛśam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_15: iti sthitapāṭhābhiprāyeṇānaucityaṃ dattapāṭhāśayena tv aucityam ity arthaḥ / tacchabdenānye
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_16: parāmṛśyante / sādṛśyam eveti / tadā yacchabdasya napuṃsakatā syāt / tasmāt surārivety
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_17: atra parāmṛśyata iti avivekākṣamaprajñatvāt / tadapahṛteti bhaṅgibhaṇitivaicitryaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:126_18: parāmṛṣṭam / utkaṭena bhaṇitivaicitryeṇa varṇanīyam ācchāditam ity arthaḥ / tad uktaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:129_0: iti / aprādhānyaṃ syād iti / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - yadi śabdavyāpāraviṣayasya prādhānyam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:129_1: arthavyāpāraviṣayasya cāprādhānyam iti vyavasthā, tadā trividhasya pratīyamānasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:129_3: tasyārthavyāpāraviṣayatvāt, śabdavyāpāraviṣayatvasya dūṣitatvāt / iṣyate ca prādhānyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:129_4: tat katham iyaṃ prādhānyāprādhānyapratītir ghaṭata iti / cakrābhighātetyādau ca paryāyokte
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:129_5: samāsoktivad gamyamānasyaiva prādhānyaṃ na vācyasyety upapāditaṃ prāk / ekābhighāta
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:129_6: iti hayagrīvavadhe pāṭhaḥ sthitaḥ, sudarśanasya pulliṅgasya prakrāntatvād ya ity
