GK16ruvyavivya_pu:129_7: anena parāmarśāt / tat tv anavabudhya cakraṃ yadi parāmṛśyate, tadā yacchabdasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:129_8: napuṃsakatā syāt / tan murārir evātra parāmṛśyata ity āśayena cakrābhighāteti paṭhanti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:129_9: na tv ayaṃ tatra prastāvaḥ / tadapekṣayaiva prādhānyam aprādhānyaṃ ceti iha gamakam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:129_10: apradhānam upāyatvāt / gamyaṃ pradhānam upeyatvāt / tena pratīyamānasya gamyatvāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:129_11: prādhānyavyavahāraḥ / na pratītyapekṣayeti / śabdenārthena ca yā pratītis, tadapekṣayā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:129_12: na prādhānyāprādhānyavyavahāra ity arthaḥ / tayas tv iha gamyagamakabhāvaviviktaviṣayatvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:129_13: cintā kṛtā / tadapekṣayaiva ceti / vācyasyāpi yaḥ śābdatvena prādhānyavyavahārayogas
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:129_14: tasyāpi / tadapekṣayā gamyagamakatvāpekṣayā / kva cid yatra pratīyamānasadbhāvas
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:129_15: tatrāprādhānyam ity arthaḥ / vācyaṃ hi pratīyamānaṃ prati gamakatvena vyavasthitaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:129_16: tena tadapekṣatvenāprādhānyam iti tātparyam / vicitrā bhaṅgibhiṇitaya iti yathā bhaṭṭabāṇasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:129_17: teṣu teṣu sthāneṣu / abhibhūyamānatvād iti / yad uktaṃ dhvanikṛtā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:131_0: iti / vākyabhedāc ceti vākyāntarāpekṣayā hi vākyāntarasya bhaṅgibhaṇitivaicitryam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:131_1: ity aṃśena pratītivaidūryān na prakramabhedadoṣaṃ prakāśayati / nyāyasiddhatvād iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:131_2: nyāyo 'tra bhaṇitivaiṣamyam / kāraṇabhedasyāpīti na kevalaṃ pratītibhedo bhedahetuḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:131_3: yāvat kāraṇabhedo 'pi / pratītibhedo vijñaptyapekṣayā bhedahetuḥ, kāraṇabhedaḥ punar
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:132: ayam eva bhedo bhedahetur vā bhāvānāṃ yo 'yaṃ viruddhadharmādhyāsaḥ kāraṇabhedaś ca
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:133_1: sa ceti prakramabhedaḥ / śābdaś cārthaś ceti pūrvaṃ prakṛtyādiprakramabhedavilakṣaṇau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:133_2: śābdārthaprakramabhedau lakṣitāv udāhṛtau ca / adhunā vācyapratīyamānārthāpekṣayā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:133_4: uktāv iti viśeṣo boddhavyaḥ / vastuprakramabheda iti / vastu varṇanīyaṃ yathā varṇayituṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:133_5: prakrāntaṃ tasya tathā nirvāhābhāvād vastuprakramabhedaḥ / bhedeneti avayavasaṃbandhitvenety
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:133_6: arthaḥ / prathame hi pāde avayavina eva svarūpeṇa varṇanaṃ prakrāntam ity avayavisaṃbandhitvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:133_7: nirvāhaṇaṃ doṣaḥ / ubhayatrāpīti avayavivarṇane avayavavarṇane ca / tat svarūpaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:133_8: nāyikāsvarūpam / aṅgena ity āmantraṇam / patatu adhastāt gacchatu / sādṛśyapratipādaneti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:133_9: dvicandram iti hi pāṭhe vadanena saha candro nabhaso dvicandratām āpādayati / tac
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:133_10: ca vadanacandrayoḥ sādṛśyamūlam iti vyatirekaprakrame sādṛśyanirvāhāt prakramabhedaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:133_11: vastusargapaunaruktyasyeti punaruktavastuvirasa ity atra hi punaruktavastubhir virasa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:133_12: iti vyākhyāne sādṛśyena nirvāhaḥ kṛtaḥ / vyatirekeṇa ca prakrama iti doṣa evāyam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:133_13: vimukha iti / ke cit punaruktavastuṣu virasaḥ punaruktāni vastūni na karotīti vyākhyānena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:133_14: vyatirekanirvāhād yathāsthitapāṭhaṃ samarthayāṃ cakre / arthadoṣāṇām iti prakramātikramarūpāṇām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:134: tapena varṣāḥ śaradā himāgamo, vasantalakṣmyā śiśiraḥ sametya ca /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:135: prasūnakṛtyaṃ dadataḥ sadartavaḥ pure 'sya vāstavyakuḍumbitāṃ dadhuḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_0: atra hi strīpuruṣayugalatrayarūpatayā ṛtūnāṃ varṇane prastute strīrūpāṇām ṛtunāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_1: tṛtīyāsaṃbandhād aprādhānye vivakṣite yat tapena varṣā ity atra viparyayaḥ kṛtaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_2: kṛte vā tathā nirdeśe śaradā himāgama ityādau yad anyathākaraṇaṃ, sa prakramabheda
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_3: eva / yadi paraṃ strīpuṃsayor atra yena krameṇa prakramaḥ tasyānyathā nirvāhāt kramaprakramabhedam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_4: imaṃ vidmaḥ / tena pūrvaṃ kramaprakramabhedasyedam evodāharaṇaṃ deyam / tena varaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_5: ghanaśriyoṣṇaḥ śaradā himāgamaḥ iti pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ / kartṛprakramabhedo 'pīti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_6: yatra yuṣmadasmadarthagataṃ kartṛtvaṃ śeṣe 'tra cetane 'cetane vā vaktrā buddhipūrvakam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_7: evāropyate, tatra kartur anyasyāropaś cārutvāya vyatyāso guṇa evety arthaḥ / tayor
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_8: iti / yatra kartṛvyatyāsaprakramabhedayoḥ / na prakaraṇāvasita iti / yuṣmadasmadarthasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_9: hi kva cit kartṛtvaṃ prakaraṇādyavasitaṃ na śabdenābhidhātuṃ prakrāntam iti nāyaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_10: prakramabhedadoṣasya viṣayaḥ / anyatrāropyaivam uktam iti śeṣatvena vivakṣite rāmabhadre /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_11: evam uttaratra bhārgave vaṭau cānyatvaṃ yojanīyam / nanu yuṣmadasmadarthasya cetanatvāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_12: tadapekṣayācetanasyaivānyatvam ucitam iti kathaṃ cetanasyaivānyatvam ity āha - dvividho
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_13: hīti / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ / na yuṣmadasmadarthagatacetanatvāpekṣayā vastvantarasyānyatvam,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_14: api tu yuṣmadasmadarthatvāpekṣayaiva / yuṣmadasmadarthau ca kramāt saṃbodhyamānavastuniṣṭhaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_15: parabhāvo 'smitākhyā pratyaktā ca / tataś ca tadapekṣayā śeṣasyānyatvam / tasya ca
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_16: cetanatvācetanatvād dvaividhyam iti na virodhaḥ kaś cit / paraśunā candrahāsa iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_17: krameṇa dvayor api yuṣmadasmadarthayor acetanaviṣayakartṛtāvyatyāsa udāharaṇam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_18: bho laṅkeśvara iti / atra rāmaḥ svayaṃ yācata iti asmadarthakartṛtvasya cetanaviṣayavyatyāsasyānyat
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:136_19: sthitam apy udāharaṇīyaṃ na cintitaṃ, pūrvam udāharaṇāntare cintitatvāt, cintāntaraprastāvāc
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_0: tad evam iyatā prabandhena prakramabhedaṃ vicārya kramaprāptaṃ kramabhedaṃ vicārayitum
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_1: āha kramebhedo yatheti / nanu yadi smṛtiparāmarśakasya tacchabdasyānubhūta evārtho
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_2: viṣaya ity ucyate, ye 'tyantaparokṣā rāmādayas teṣāṃ kavinā kāvye tacchabdena kathaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_3: parāmarśaḥ kriyate teṣām atīndriyatvād ity āha atra ca pratītimātram iti / ayam atrābhiprāyaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_4: yena vinā yan nopapadyate, tasya tadapekṣā nyāyyā / smṛtiś ca pratītimātram antareṇānupapadyamānā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_5: tadapekṣiṇī syāt, naindriyikapratītyapekṣiṇī aindriyakapratītiṃ vināpi śabdādibhyaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_6: pratītau tasyāḥ saṃbhavadarśanāt / rāmādīnāṃ ca yadi naindriyikī pratītis tadā śabdāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_7: prasiddher vā pratītir astu / tannibandhanaś ca smṛtiparāmarśakena tacchabdena parāmarśa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_8: iti na kaś cid virodhaḥ / nanv iti / ayam atrārthaḥ / padārthavimarśapurassaro vākyārthavimarśa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_9: iti na padārthavimarśavelāyāṃ bhavatv iyam āśaṅkā / vākyārthavimarśasamaye tv akhaṇḍapratītau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_10: pūrvāparabhāvaniyamāvabhāsanābhāvān nāsya doṣasyāvakāśaḥ / uddeśyatvāc ca vākyārthapratīter
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_11: antaraṅgatvam iti tadāśrayeṇaiva vyavasthopapattau na kramadoṣacintā kā cid iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_13: śabdavyavahāramukhena śrotṛgṛhīto vākyārthavimarśaḥ svīkṛtaḥ / vaktur iti yadi śortṛvimarśaparyavasāyī
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_14: śabdavyavahāro vaktṛvimarśapraticchandakarūpo na syāt, tadā śabdair vaktṛvimarśasyāsaṃbandhitvād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_15: anumānaṃ na syād ity arthaḥ / tatra cāsāv iti vaktṛśrotṛgate vākyārthavimarśe sūkṣmatvenāsphuṭarūpo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_16: 'sty eva paurvāparyapratibhāsa iti yāvat / padārthabuddhāv iti vākyārthapūrvabhāsinyām /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_17: tatrāpīti / vaktṛśrotṛgatavākyārthavimarśe 'pi sūkṣmaḥ padārthāśrayo doṣo durnivāraḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_18: padārthān atikrameṇaiva vākyārthavimarśasya vyavasthitatvād ity arthaḥ / pramādaja
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_19: iti / evaṃ sati prakraṃsyamānavastuparāmarśadoṣas tāvat parigṛhītā bhavati / pratīpagamanahetor
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_20: iti gajasetubandhād ity asya / śābdasyeti pañcamyantatvāt / tadīyatīrthābhidhāneti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_21: hetuhetumatos tadīyatīrthaśabdena vyavadhāne satīty arthaḥ / gaṅgāviśeṣaṇamukheneti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_22: gajasetubandhām iti pāṭhe / ayam atrāśayaḥ - śābdo yatra hetuhetumadbhāvas tatra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_23: hetutvenāpanyāsān na tayor vyavadhānaṃ kiṃ cit kāryam, pratītiviprakarṣaprasaṅgāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_24: ārthe hetuhetumadbhāve upanyastasya hetutvād viśeṣaṇabhūtasya hetor viśeṣyasvarūpavarṇanena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_25: caritārthatvāt saty api vyavadhāne na pratītiviprakarṣaḥ kaś cit, paryālocanasāmarthyād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_26: dhetutvapratīteḥ / atra ca śloke tīrthe tadīye iti padadvayākaraṇe 'pi vākyārthasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_27: nirākāṅkṣtvāt tatkaraṇam apuṣṭārtham eva / tadeti tacchabdena / iti tacchabdaḥ āropanivṛttāv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_28: iti āropo bhramo 'nyasyānyatvena pratītiḥ, yathā navajaladharasya sannaddhadṛptiniśācaratvena /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_29: tannivṛttāv atra vakṣyamānāyām āropaviṣayasya jaladharāder vastusataḥ prakāśamānasyedamādinā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_30: nyāyye nirdeśe tasya parāmṛśyasamīpa eva prayogeṇa bhāvyam / yas tv avastusadāropyamāṇanikaṭe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:137_31: prayogaḥ sa kramabhedam āvahati / yas tv atraivāropaviṣayasvarūpatayā vidyuto nikaṭa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:138: utkhātadrutam iva śailaṃ himahatakamalākaram iva lakṣmīvimuktam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:139: pītamadiram iva caṣakaṃ bahulapradoṣam iva mugdhacandrarahitam //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:140_0: itīveti / atropalambharūpaḥ pūrvavākyārtha itiśabdāvacchinna utprekṣyata ity upālabdhety
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:140_1: ataḥ pūrvam itīvaśabdau prayojyau / viṣayāntare tu prayogāt kramabhedaḥ / prāpipayiṣupadeneti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:140_2: pūrvavākyārthasthitena / tadadhīnatvaṃ puruṣāyattatvam / stambaram iti pīnonnatastanadvayadarśanād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:140_3: ayaṃ praśaṃsoktiḥ / ṣidgāḥ viṭāḥ / pratītivaicitryam iti vākyārthasya tilatuṇḍalīkṛtasyāvagamānavagamau /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:140_4: uktisvarūpeti / uktiḥ stamberamaḥ pariṇinaṃsur asāv upaiti ity eṣā / tasyā viṭasaṃbandhinyāḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:140_5: svarūpam itiśabdenopalakṣaṇatvād evaṃśabdādinā vyavacchettum iṣṭam / ataś ca tatra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:140_6: tasmād itiśabdād itiśabdopalakṣitād evamādayaś ca prāk pūrvam ukteḥ pūrvapradarśitāyāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:140_7: anyat kiṃ cit padaṃ ṣidga ityādi na kathanīyam ity arthaḥ / evam udāharaṇāntare 'pi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:140_8: yojanīyam / upādhibhāvād iti itiśabdasya svā śaktiḥ pūrvavākyāvacchedarūpā / tāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:140_9: pūrvatra vākye samarpayaṃs tasyopādhir itiśabdaḥ saṃpadyate / ataś ca na tasyānyatra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:140_10: prayogaḥ karttavya ity arthaḥ / padasyānyasyeti ṣidgair ityādeḥ / anyatheti viṣayāntaraprayoge
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:143_0: iti nyāyenārthaucityavaśād vyavahitānām apy ānantaryaniyamo bhaviṣyatīty arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:143_2: iti teṣāṃ prayogo niyataḥ syād ity uktam / nanu yasya yenābhisaṃbandho nyāyyaḥ kutrāvatiṣṭhatām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:143_3: ity āha kaiś cid eveti / ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - ityādiśabdavarjanenoktakrameṇa śabdahetvādivarjanena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:143_4: cānyeṣāṃ śabdānām ayaṃ nyāyaḥ / ityādīnām ayaṃ punar niyataprayogaviṣaya iti / nānyathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:144_0: evam uddeśakrameṇa kramabhedaṃ vimṛśya paunaruktyaṃ vicārayitum āha paunaruktyam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:144_1: iti / iha khalu dvividhaṃ paunaruktyaṃ śabdapaunaruktyam arthapaunaruktyaṃ ceti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:144_2: tad uktam akṣpādamuninā - śabdārthayoḥ punarvacana[ṃ] punaruktam anyatrānuvādād iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:144_3: tatra śabdapaunaruktyam arthāpaunaruktye na doṣaḥ, arthapaunaruktyena duṣṭatva[ṃ]
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:144_4: arthasyaiva prayojakatvāt / arthapaunaruktyam evaikaṃ paunaruktyaṃ na śabdapaunaruktyam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:144_5: iti samudāyārthaḥ / ārtham iti arthāśritam / evaṃ śābdam ity atrāpi vācyam / yad
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:144_6: uktam iti vādanyāye / hasatīti eko hasatiśabdaḥ śatrantaḥ svāmiviśeṣaṇam, aparaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:144_7: kriyāpadam / evam uttaratra vācyam / yantram iti / abhedopacāreṇa bhṛtyasya nirdeśaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:144_8: kṛtānukāritvāt / anyatra tātparyabhedād iti tātparyabhede hi svarūpārthāviśeṣe lāṭānuprāsa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:146: śabdānāṃ vā padānāṃ vā lāṭānuprāsa iṣyate //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:147_0: iti / śakrasaṅkāśeti śrīnadīhaṃseti medinīcandreti vidviṣāṃ kāleti ca catvāryāmantraṇāṇi /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:147_1: atra tātparyabhedaḥ sphuṭa eva / tathā caikaḥ kāśaśabdo vastrāṇām upameyatvena sthitaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:147_2: anyas tu hasānām upamānatveneti bhinnaṃ tātparyam / evam anyad api yojanīyam / ubhayābhāve
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:147_3: iti arthabhedasya tātparyabhedasya cābhāva ity arthaḥ / na ca ghāseti karmatvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:147_4: saṃbandhitvena cāstu tātparyabheda ity arthaḥ / etan na ceti niṣidhyate / svārtham
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:147_5: iti / etad uktaṃ bhavati - na svārthābhidhānam eva tātparyam, api tu saty eva svārthābhidhāne
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:147_6: 'dhikam arthāntaronmukhatvaṃ tātparyaṃ, yathā kāśaśabdayoḥ / tatra kāśajātyavacchinnadravyapratipādanād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:147_7: atirikta upamānopameyabhāvaḥ pratipādyate / na caivaṃbisaśabdayoḥ / na hy atra bisajātyavacchinnadravyātiriktaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:147_8: kiṃ cid vastu pratīyate / yat tu karmatvaṃ saṃbandhitvaṃ ca tadabhidheyasyaiva tathāvasthānaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:147_9: nodrekeṇānyatām āvahatīti svaśabdaparihāreṇa sarvanāmaparāmarśasyaiva viṣayo nyāyya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:147_10: iti / nanu punaruktaṃ kim ucyate yatra tat prayogaṃ vinārthapratītiḥ yatra ca tatsamānapadāntaraprayogo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:147_11: 'vaśyam upayujyate, tatra kathaṃ punaruktatvam / yatraikārthena pratītir na tātparyabhedaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:147_12: tatra punaruktatvaṃ pratītivairasyāpādānāt / yatra tu tat samānaṃ padāntaram upayujyatāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:147_13: mā vā / sarvathā tatprayogakṛta vairasyaṃ paunaruktyaprayojakam iti tadāśrayeṇāyaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_0: sarvanāmeti jakṣur bisam ity atra nirdiṣṭaṃ bisam uttaratra prasūnasaṃbandhitvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_1: sarvanāmaparāmarśārhaṃ sad yat svaśabdenoktaṃ, tat śabdapunaruktam / yady apy arthapunaruktam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_2: evaikaṃ punaruktaṃ prāg uktaṃ tathāpi śabdasya punaruktatety uktam arthamukhenaiva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_3: śabdasyāpi punaruktatety abhiprāyeṇa / sarvanāmaparāmarśayogyasyeti nirdiṣṭāṃ yogyatāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_4: vibhaktum āha - prādhānyam iti / dvividhaṃ parāmarśayogyatvaṃ śābdam ārthaṃ ceti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_5: tatra yasmin parāmṛśyasya svātantryeṇa kartṛtvādinā nirdeśena prādhānyaṃ tatra śābdam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_6: yatra punaḥ parāmṛśyasyānyaḥ kaś cit saṃbandhitvena nirdiśyate, tatrārtham / tatra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_7: hi saṃbandhinaṃ prati asyopayoga eva yogyatvam / tathā caikam udāhṛtam / saṃbandhipratītimukheneti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_8: atra saṃbandhī haraḥ tasya maulidvāreṇa śaśāṅkasaṃbandhitvāt / tatpratītimukhena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_9: cātra śaśāṅkaḥ pratīyate, na tu cārutā vapur ityādau cārutāder iva sākṣād eva śaśāṅkasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_10: pratītiḥ / śaśāṅkasaṃbandhinām iti / atra saṃbandhinibandha iti kārikāyāṃ yaḥ saṃbandhī
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_11: yuktaḥ, sa nirdiṣṭaḥ / tathā cātrāṃśavaḥ saṃbandhitvena nirdiṣṭāḥ / tatparāmarśayogyateti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_12: tacchabdena parāmṛśyaḥ śaśāṅko nirdiṣṭaḥ / sā hi guṇībhūtasyeti / haramanyapadārthaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_13: prati niśāpatir guṇībhūtaḥ / tasyāpi niśā guṇībhūtā / sā ca bhuvaneti / atra na nagendratanayāyāḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_14: saṃbandhī nirdiṣṭaḥ / api tu sā cety anena svarūpam nirdiṣṭam / vihasto na kva cic
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_15: chaktaḥ / samāsagatasyeti parāmṛśyasyeti saṃbandhaḥ / tatra hi parāmṛśyasya samāse
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:148_16: guṇībhāvāt saṃbandhinaś cānirdeśāt parāmarśo na nyāyyaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:149_0: na sarvajanasaṃvedanīya iti / asyārthaḥ - yathāsmai rocate viśvaṃ tathedaṃ parivartate
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:149_1: iti nyāyenātrātiprauḍhatayā granthakāro nijāyattāṃ padārthavyavasthāṃ karttum ārabdhaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:149_2: yena tadaṃśunicitaḥ iti tat tamasām iti ca śaśāṅkasya niśāyāś ca tacchabdena parāmarśam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:149_3: aghaṭamānam api samarthayate, jakṣur bisaṃ ghṛtavikāsibisaprasūnā ity atra ca bisaprasūnaśabdasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:149_4: saṃjñāpadasyāpi bisaśabdāśrayeṇa sūkṣmekṣikayā paunaruktyaṃ doṣam udbhāvayati / na
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:149_5: caitat samarthanaṃ hṛdayahāri, yasmāc chaśāṅkamaulir iti ca niśāpatimaulir iti ca
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:149_6: saṃjñāśabdāv etau / saṃjñāśabdānāṃ ca vidyamānasyāpy arthānugamasya na prayojakatvaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:149_7: rūḍheḥ prādhānyāt / tataś cātra na śaśāṅkārtho na niśārthaḥ kaś cit / kiṃ tūpāyamātreṇaitāv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:149_8: arthāv āśritya saṃjñiviśeṣa evātra vivakṣitaḥ / evaṃ ca saṃjñyantargatayoḥ śaśāṅkaniśayos
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:149_9: tacchabdaparāmarśena sahṛdayahṛdayāny āvarjayatīti haṭhasarmathanam etat / kiṃ ca
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:149_10: śaśāṅkamaulir ity atra varaṃ śaśāṅkasya bhavatu sarvanāmnā parāmarśaḥ tasya vakrākṛtes
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:149_11: tatra saṃnihitatvāt, niśāpatimaulir ity atra tu niśāyāḥ parāmarśaḥ pāpāt pāpīyān
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:149_12: niśāpater evoktakrameṇa tatra saṃnihitatvāt / niśāyā upalakṣaṇamātratvenopayoginyās
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:149_13: tatra saṃbhavābhāvāt / yatra ca tasyā eva na saṃbhavas tatra kā vārtā tamasām / tad
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:149_14: ayam andho maṇim avindat / tam anaṅgulir āvayad iti nyāya āyāt / api ca yatra prasāritānugamena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:149_15: śabdena saṃjñinaḥ pratyāyanaṃ kriyate, paraṃ tatrānugamotkarṣād bhavati sarvanāmaparāmarśaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:151: tatprabhābhir iva pūritaṃ vapur bhāti yasya sitabhasmaguṇṭhitam //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:152_0: iti / atra hi pādavyāpinī saṃjñānvarthatvam evotkarṣayati / tenātra parāmarśo nāpratītikaraḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:152_1: prakṛte tu tādṛśy api gatir nāsti / āstāṃ vā prakṛtam / atrāpi hi rohiṇīramaṇetyādau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:152_2: yadi sūkṣmekṣikā kriyate tadā saṃjñāprādhānyāt tadaṃśasya sarvanāmaparāmarśo nāduṣṭatām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:152_3: bhajate / prakṛte tu pāpāt pāpīyān parāmarśaḥ / kṛtaṃ cātra samarthanaṃ granthakṛtā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:152_4: tad etad asya viśvam agaṇanīyaṃ manyamānasya svātmanaḥ sarvotkarṣaśālitākhyāpanam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:153_0: granthakarttuḥ punar ayam āśayaḥ - iha tu dvividhāḥ saṃjñāśabdāḥ rūḍhā yogarūḍhayaś
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:153_1: ca / tatra rūdḥānām arthānugamābhāvāt tadanusaraṇaṃ na karttavyam / ye tu yogarūḍhayas
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:153_2: teṣāṃ yadi yoga utkaṭatāṃ bhajate tadāśrayo vyavahāro na duṣyati / ata eva nimittabalena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:153_3: pravṛttasya śabdasya nimittāntarbhāve prayogaḥ saugatair niṣiddha eva / yad āhuḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:155: śabdānām anurundhāno na bādhas tena varṇitaḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_0: iti / evaṃ sthite yogāśrite vyavahāre yadi saṃjñāvayavabhūtārthasyāvyabhicārī kaś
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_1: cit pratipipādayiṣitaḥ syāt tadā tadabhisaṃbandhāya tasyāvayavasya sarvanāmaparāmarśo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_2: na duṣṭaḥ / yad uktam - sarvanāmnānusaṃdhivṛtticchannasya iti / maulir ity atra śaśāṅkāvyabhicāriṇo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_3: raśmayaḥ saṃbandhitvena pratipāditāḥ / niśāpatimaulir ity atra niśāvyabhicārīṇi tamāṃsi /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_4: teṣāṃ cāvāstavatvam api na tathā duṣṭam, utprekṣāgocaratvena pratipāditatvāt / kevalaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_5: pūrvatra saṃjñisaṃbandhī, paratra tu saṃbandhisaṃbandhī parāmṛṣṭa iti viśeṣaḥ / tad
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_6: evaṃ yaugikānāṃ saṃjñāśabdānāṃ yoganimitto vyavahāraḥ kva cit kva cit suvyavasthita
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_7: eva / yat tu kuryāṃ harasyāpi pinākapāṇer ity atra pinākapāṇipadasya saṃjñāśabdasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_8: sato 'rthānugamo nivārayiṣyate yena saṃjñāvagamārthaṃ haraśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ, tan nārthānugamābhāvapratipādanapareṇa,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_9: kiṃ tv anugamyamānasyārthasya saṃrambhāspadatvena vivakṣitatvaṃ pṛthak saṃjñāpadaprayogam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_10: antareṇa na nirvahati saṃjñārthasyārthānugamasya ca yugapat prādhānyābhāvād iti dvayaprayoga
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_11: evaivaṃvidheṣu sthāneṣu śasyata ity abhiprāyeṇa / prakṛte vastusvarūpamātrapratipādane
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_12: saṃjñāśabdatve 'py arthānugamānusaraṇam avyāhatam iti / itarathety ubhayavidhayogyatābhāve
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_13: parāmṛśyapratīter abhāvād ity arthaḥ / atra tv iti / jakṣur bisam ity atra / saṃbandhinaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_14: prasūnasya nibandhane upādāne / ārtha iti / kriyākārakabhāvasyākhyātapadavācyatvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_15: śābdena krameṇa prastāve 'tra viśeṣaṇadvāreṇa samāsena pra to 'rthaḥ pratīter ārthatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_16: taccānekaprakāram iti tacchabdena paunaruktyaṃ parāmṛṣṭam / saṃkṣepeṇa pañcaprakāraṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_17: paunaruktya nirdiśyate / aśvīyeti / atra keśāśvābhyāṃ yañchau iti samūhe 'rthe chapratyayaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_18: evaṃ chapratyayaḥ saṃhatiśabdaś ca bhisaḥ prakṛtitvena nirdiṣṭau punar uktau / aśvair
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_19: ity eva hi vācyam / biseti bisakisalayacchedapātheyā iti tvaguttarāsaṅgām iti ca
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:156_20: vācyam / bahuvrīhīti matvarthe bahuvrīhividhānam / karmadhārayamatvarthīyābhyām iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_0: iti bahavo bhūmādayo 'rthā astyartham anugacchanto mattvarthīyatāviṣayatvenoktāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_1: te kim iti na bahuvrīhivācyatvenoktā ity āha mator iti / matubgrahaṇaṃ matvarthīyānām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_2: upalakṣaṇam / bhūmādayo hy arthā na kevalebhyo matubādibhyaḥ pratīyante, kiṃ tu prakraṇādisahāyebhyas
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_3: tebhya iti na matubādivicāreṇodāhriyante, nāntarīyakatayā teṣāṃ gatatvāt / jāmbaveti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_4: tadīyeti vanyeti ca taddhitapratyayasya paunaruktyam / jambūpallavānīti, tanmātaṅgeti,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_6: vārtraghneti vṛtraghna indrasyāpatyam atra vivakṣitaṃ, nedam artha iti nātra taddhitasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_7: paunaruktyam / samūhārthāyā iti / grāmajanabandhusahāyebhyaḥ iti samūhe talpratyayaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_8: atra janaśabdenaiva samūhārthapratītes talpratyayarūpāyāḥ prakṛter bahuvacanasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_9: pratyayasya ca paunaruktyam / pūrvavad iti dalatkandaleti lambāmbudam iti phullāmbujā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_10: iti ca bahuvrīhiṇaiva bhajaty arthādīnāṃ pratīteḥ punar uktatvam / viśeṣyamātreti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_11: viśeṣyasyāviśiṣṭaviśeṣyarūpatayā viśiṣṭaviśeṣyarūpatayā vā pratītiḥ / tatra viśiṣṭaviśeṣyarūtayā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_12: pratītau yatra viśeṣaṇamātrād eva viśeṣyasyaiva pratītiḥ, tatra viśeṣyaprayogo na
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_13: duṣyati yathā tatra prasādād ity atra vakṣyate / kiṃ tūpāyamatreṇaitāva bhavaśabdasyeti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_14: śītakiraṇābharaṇa ity anenaiva pratītatvād bhavārthasya, yathā nidhānagarbhām iva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_15: sāgarāmbarām ity atra sāgarāmbarāśabdena medinyāḥ / camūrur mṛgaviśeṣaḥ / kuthaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_17: nāgendraśabdaprayoge ca śuklavarṇasya varṇitatvād indravāhanapratītir ity ekatarasyaiva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_18: prayogo nyāyyaḥ / yatra tad ityādinā viśiṣṭaviśeṣyarūpatayā viśeṣyapratipattim udāharati /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_19: tadviśeṣaḥ viśeṣyagato viśeṣaḥ / haraśabdasyeti pinākapāṇiśabdena haragato viśeṣaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_20: pratipādyate yaḥ sarvotkarṣahetutvena vivakṣito na sajñimātram ity arthaḥ / viśeṣyopādānam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_21: antareṇāpīti / kusumāyudhaśabdo 'pi hi viśeṣaṇam api viśeṣyam avagamayaty avyabhicārāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_22: na tu tasya pṛthakprayogaḥ / atrāpīti pinākapāṇer ity atra liṅuttamapuruṣeṇaiveti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_23: asmady uttamaḥ ity atra hi sthāniny apīty anuvartanād aprayukte 'py asmacchabde tadarthasaṃbhave
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_24: uttamapuruṣo bhavaty eva / tadanupādānaṃ viśeṣyānupādānam / anyeṣām iti / bahuvacanād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_25: īdṛkṣu sthāneṣv ekenaivevaśabdena gatārthatvād anyeṣāṃ prayogo viphala ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_26: tṛtīyasyāpīti vākyārthaupamyavivakṣāyām eka evevaśabdaḥ prayoktavyaḥ / padārthaupamyavivakṣaṇe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_27: tu yāvanto viśeṣyabhūtāḥ padārthās tāvanta ivaśabdāḥ prayoktavyāḥ / na tv ardhajaratīyaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_28: kāryam ity arthaḥ / etac cābhyupagamavādenoktam / na tu saṃbhavantyāṃ vākyārthopamāyāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_29: padārthopamāḥ kāryā ity asya pakṣaḥ / tathā ca dine dine ityādinā dūṣayiṣyati / dine
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_30: dine iti / atra cāndramasyā lekhāyā pārvatyupamānaṃ, viśeṣāṇāṃ tu kalāntarāṇi / viśeṣāṇāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_31: ca lāvaṇyamayān iti viśeṣaṇam / tatsthanīyaṃ kalāntarāṇāṃ jyotsnāntarāṇīti / jyotsnāntare
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_32: yeṣām iti hi vyākhyā / dine dine ityādi pārvatīndulekhayoḥ sādhāraṇo dharmaḥ / na
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_33: tu kalāntarāṇi kartṝṇi jyotsnāntarāṇi puṣṇatīti sādhvī vyākhyā vacanabhedādidoṣaprasaṅgāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_34: atra cāndramasīva lekhā kalāntarāṇi puṣṇātīty ekenaivevaśabdena gatārthatve dvitīyasyevaśabdasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_35: paunaruktyam / yaṃ sametyeti / atra yam ity asya caṇḍamāruta upamānaṃ, cedipadasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_36: ca pradīpaḥ / tulyārthe vatiḥ / vilocanapraśamanād eva śambhuvibhramatyāgaḥ / atra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_38: vikṛtapadaprayogo vairasyaṃ ca dupariharam eva / tena caṇḍamārutanavapradīpavad iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_39: pāṭhaḥ śreyān / evaṃ hi miśabdasthāne naśabdamātrakaraṇena stokamātravyatyāsena saukaryeṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_40: doṣaparihārapratītiḥ saundaryaṃ ca / malayajārdram iveti himāṃśukhaṇḍasyotprekṣyatvenopanibaddham
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_41: ākāṅkṣāsaṃnidhisāmarthyāl lalāṭataṭasya viśeṣaṇaṃ paryavasyatīti kaver abhiprāyaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_42: vastutas tv ivaśabdaprayogam antareṇāpīṣṭasiddher ivaśabdaḥ punar uktaḥ / na candrakhaṇḍasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_43: malayajārdratvotprekṣaṇe prayojanaṃ kiṃ cit / yatra caitad dhi viśeṣaṇam upayujyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_44: tatrevaśabdaprayogo vyarthaḥ / tadabhinnārtheneti samāse ivārthagarbhīkārāt / viparyayeṇeti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_45: lalāṭataṭanikaṭe prayogārhatvāt / varam iti ivaśabdasya bhinnakramatvāparihārād anavatṛptiḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_46: kevalaṃ hārīty asya samāsākaraṇād ivārthāpratīter ivaśabdo na punar ukta iti paunaruktyaparihāraḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:160_47: kṛtaḥ / aho aparyanteti od iti pragṛhyasaṃjñā / upamārūpaketyādinā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_0: iti / vakroktijīvitakṛtas tu tam alaṅkārapuṣṭhapātinam alaṅkāraṃ dūṣayati / nirmokam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_1: uktim iveti atropamārūpakatvaṃ paraprasiddhyoktam / na tv idam upamārūpakam / utprekṣārūpakaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_2: tu syāt, nirmokam uktas saṃbhāvyamānatvena pratīteḥ / tathā hi nirmokānuguṇyāt tāvat
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_3: gaganasyorageṇa rūpaṇam / nirvyūḍhe ca rūpake nirmokam uktir na tāṭasthyena pratīyate,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_4: kiṃ tu gaganoragasaṃbandhitvena / gaganoragasaṃbandhitvena ca pratītau na sādṛśyam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_5: api tv adhyavasāyaḥ / tasya ca pravṛttamānatvam ity utprekṣaiva jyāyāsī pratītau /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_6: ataś ceyaṃdaṃmuktipadaṃ kṛtam / anyathā śuddhasādṛśyapratipādane dharmy eva viśiṣṭo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_7: nirmoka upamānatvena nirdeśyaḥ syāt / bhinnaliṅgayor upamāyā duṣṭatvān na nirdiṣṭa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_8: iti cen na / sādhāraṇadharmasyānirdeśe nirdiṣṭasyāpi vā dvairūpyābhāve bhinnaliṅgasaṅkhyayor
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_9: api strīva gacchati ṣaṇḍo 'yam ityādau hantāvahanti doṣā iva nṛpatīnāṃ guṇa iha sahaivadurvinayam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_10: ityādau copamānopameyabhāvasyeṣṭatvāt / tasmād upamāyāṃ nirmoka iveti syāt / utprekṣāyāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_11: kriyāmātrotprekṣaṇam upapadyata ity utprekṣārūpakam etat paramārthataḥ / etad asmābhir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_12: harṣacaritavārttike vistṛtya pratipāditaṃ tata evāvaseyam / evaṃ paraśur ivetyādau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_13: vācyam / tamoraṇyavahner ivārcir iti / atra tamaso 'raṇyena rūpeṇa vahnir arcissaṃbandhitayā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_14: vivakṣitaḥ samāse niveśanīyaḥ, yato na kaś cid atra nirdiṣṭaḥ yo vahninā rūpyeta /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_15: tasmāt tamoraṇyasya vahnyarcir iti vaktavyam ity atra vācyāvacanaṃ doṣaḥ / ālānam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:163_16: iti saty eva sādṛśye āropyāropakabhāvasya nidarśanam / cumbatīveti / atroprekṣārthe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:164_0: atra copamārūpakābhimate evaṃvidhe ca pradeśe granthakāro hevākitayaiva dūṣaṇam adāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:164_1: tathā śabdārthayor vicchittir alaṅkāraḥ / vicchittiś ca kavipratibhollāsarūpatvāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:164_2: kavipratibhollāsasya cānantyād anantatvaṃ bhajamānā na paricchettuṃ śakyate / ata
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:166: nibaddhā sā kṣayaṃ naiti prakṛtir jagatām iva //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:169_0: iti / evaṃ ca yadi vicchttyantarāpekṣayā tasya vicchittyantarasya paunaruktyaṃ tadopamāyā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:169_1: rūpakādyapekṣayā paunaruktyaṃ syāt / upamāpekṣayā hi rūpakam atiśayoktir vā balīyasī /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:169_2: na caivaṃ prayujyate, vivakṣāyā nānātvāt / tathā hi kva cit sādṛśyamātraṃ vivakṣitam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:169_3: tatrāpi kva cid abhedaḥ / tasminn api kvacid āropaḥ / kvacid adhyavasāyaḥ / adhyavasāye
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:169_4: 'pi kva cit sādhyatvaṃ kva cit siddhatvam ityādikrameṇānantaprakāraṃ vicchittivaicitryam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:169_5: tatrāpi saṃyojanakrameṇa navaṃ vicchittivaicitryam anubhūyamānam āśritaṃ ca mahākavibhiḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:169_6: kathaṃ saṃkṣeparucitvenāpahnūyate / na hīdaṃ vākyaṃ lakṣaṇaśāstraṃ, yena mātrālāghavaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:169_7: cintyate / tatrāpi vā na niyamena lāghavam āśritaṃ mahadbhiḥ / tathā hi vāgrahaṇasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:169_8: sthāne 'nyatarasyāṃ grahaṇam api kṛtam / vicchittivaicitryaṃ tair apy āśritam eva /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:169_9: tad uktaṃ vicitrā hi sūtrasya kṛtiḥ pāṇineḥ iti / evaṃ cātra kṛte 'pi rūpake utprekṣādinibandhaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:169_10: kam api guṇam utkarṣayati na doṣam iti sahṛdayair nipuṇaṃ nirūpaṇīyam / na tu hevākasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:169_11: paścāl laganīyam ity āstāṃ tāvat / prakṛtam anusarāmaḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:170_0: murmuraḥ aṅgāraḥ / āmravaṇasyeti pranirantar ṇatvam / pathikavrajān parita iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:170_1: paritaśśabdayoge abhitaḥ paritaḥ samayānikaṣā iti dvitīyā / atra dadhur ivetīvaśabdaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:170_2: punar ukta eva, vastvantarabhūtānāṃ rajaḥkaṇānāṃ vastvantarabhūtamurmuracūrṇatvadhāraṇena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:171: tat pātu vaḥ śrīpatinābhipadmaṃ svādhyāyaśālā kamalāsanasya /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:172: dīrghair ninādair dadhate 'nukāraṃ sāmadhvanīnām iva yatra bhṛṅgāḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:173_0: ityādāv anukāraśabdaprayoge ivādiśabdaprayogasya paunaruktyam avaseyam / prativastvalaṅkārād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:173_1: iti pūrṇaḥ śaśāṅkābhyudayam ākāṅkṣati mahārṇavaḥ iti prativastūpamayā sādṛśyapratītau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:173_2: dṛṣṭāntaśabdoktir duṣṭā / na ca dṛṣṭāntālaṅkāratvaṃ pratipādayituṃ dṛṣṭāntaśabdaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:173_3: dṛṣṭāntaśabdād dṛṣṭāntālaṅkāratvāpratīteḥ / na hi ṣaṣṭhyādiparihāreṇa saṃbandhiśabdāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:173_4: saṃbandhapratītiḥ rasaśabdād vā rasapratītiḥ / adūraviprakarṣeṇa tv abhidhānaṃ vastusaṃsparśi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:173_5: bhavatīti / nanu svakaṇṭhenābhidhānam apahāya kim iti sādṛśyapratītir āśrīyata ity
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:173_6: āha vācyo hy artha iti / pūrvavad iti / pūrvaṃ yathā ālānam ity ādau rūpakamukhenopamānopameyabhāvaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:173_7: kathitas tadvad iha dīpakamukhenety arthaḥ / atra ca dvayoḥ prabhādhenvoḥ prākaraṇikatvāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:173_8: tulyayogitām adyatanā manyante / dvayor api prākaraṇikatve mahāprakaraṇāpekṣayā dhenoḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:173_9: prakṛṣṭaṃ prākaraṇikatvaṃ prabhāyās tv aprakrṣṭam ity etadapekṣayā cirantanair dīpakam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:173_10: etat sthāpitam / tadapekṣayātrānena tadvācoyuktiḥ kṛtā / evam alaṅkārāntareṣv api
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:174: draviṇam āpadi bhūṣaṇam utsave śaraṇam ātmabhaye niśi dīpikāḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:175: bahuvidhārthyupakārabharakṣamo bhavati ko 'pi bhavān iva san maṇiḥ //
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_0: ity atrāprastutapraśaṃsayā bhavadarthasya sadṛśatvena pratīteḥ punar vacanaṃ na karttavyam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_1: iti vakṣyate / asmābhiś caitat prapañco bṛhatyāṃ kariṣyate / itinaiveti itiśabdo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_3: vā garbhīkṛtya pravartate / varam iti uktadoṣadvayanivāraṇamātram etat / na tu sarvathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_4: niravadyam idam, yataśśabdātaśśabdayor vaiyarthyāt / anibandhanasyeti na hi pūraṇīyapūrakatvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_5: duṣṭatvam / aviśeṣaṇa iti viśeṣaṇadānārtham avyabhicāriṇo 'pi prayogaḥ śasyata ity
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_6: arthaḥ tathā cāha vāmanaḥ - viśeṣaṇasya ca iti / vyalokyateti vilokanakriyaiva lokitāraṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_7: lokam ākṣipatīti lokaśabdasya paunaruktyam / dvaya'rpāti prasthānavaśān nītivaśāc
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_8: cāśrīyante / gām iti gośabdasya vākparyāyasya vacanakriyāyām avyabhicārāt prayogo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_9: na kāryaḥ / dṛṣṭa iti darśanakriyāyā dṛg eva karaṇatvenākṣipteti dṛkśabdaḥ punar
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_10: uktaḥ / kārakāntareṣv apīti yathā sthāne tiṣṭhati ity atrādhikaraṇasya paunaruktyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_11: vivikte sthāne tiṣṭhatīti tu viśeṣaṇārthaṃ prayogo na duṣṭaḥ / ekaiveti ekaivopamādiḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_12: śābdatvaṃ śrautatvaṃ yathevādiśabdaprayogāt / ārthatvaṃ sadṛśādiśabdaprayogāt / atisphuṭām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_13: iti sthūladṛṣṭyaiva dṛśyām ity arthaḥ / umāvṛṣāṅkāv iti / atra śarajanmanā yathetyādinā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_14: pratīto 'py upamānopameyabhāvas tatsadṛśenetyādinā punar uktaḥ / kaves tu nandananimittaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_15: pūrva upamānopameyabhāvaḥ / pratīyamānaprabhāvādinimittas tv aparaḥ / tathā cāyaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_16: dilīpa iti rājendur induḥ kṣīranidhāv iva ity evaṃvidham upamānopameyabhāvam ātanoti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_17: granthakāras tu viśiṣṭopamānanirdeśān nāntarīyakatayā prabhāvādipratītir bhavatīti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_18: na dvirupādānaṃ kāryam iti manyate / yasyeti yasya pūrvatāder yadrūpatāyāḥ priyatamādirūpatvasyābhivyaktiḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_19: sāmarthyāl liṅgaviśeṣaśliṣṭapadopanibandhanarūpād bhavati, tasya parvatādeḥ tadarthaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_20: priyatamādirūpatvapratītyartham upamā rūpakaṃ vā yan nibadhyate, tat punar uktam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_21: ity arthaḥ / uravo mahāntaḥ payodharā meghāḥ urū ca payodharau stanau ca / samayāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_22: saṅgatety arthaḥ / ārdranakhakṣatam iveti bhinnakrama ivaśabdaḥ / yāpito gamitaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_23: nirvāhita ity arthaḥ / upamānād eveti ākārasādṛśyena palāśaṃ prati dīyamānād ārdranakhakṣatam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_24: ity asmāt / tadviśeṣaṇopādānam iti ramaṇadattam ity ārdranakhakṣataviśeṣaṇopādānaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_25: madayāpitalajjayeti pramadāviśeṣaṇopādānaṃ cety arthaḥ / yata iti nakhakṣatam ivety
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_26: upamopakṛtāt surabhivanamālādīnāṃ puṃstvastrītvanirdeśād ity arthaḥ / strīpuṃsatvānumitir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_27: iti prathamavimarśoktaprakāreṇa vyakter anumitirūpatvenopapāditatvāt / aindraṃ dhanur
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_28: iti atyanteti ābhogīti codāharaṇatrayaṃ vaidharmyakrameṇoktam / upapannakramasyāsya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_29: sadbhāvāt / nāyakatvapratināyakatve iti / anumīyate iti śeṣaḥ / evam aṅganeva maṇistambhāv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_30: iti anumīyata iti śeṣaḥ / bhogī vāsukeḥ sa eva netram ākarṣaṇarajjus tasya ā samantād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_31: yat parivartanarūpo viśeṣeṇa bhramo bhramaṇaṃ, tena mandarasya mūrttiḥ nitambe madhyabhāge
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_32: valanaṃ parivarttanaṃ tenākulā jātā / tathā ābhogi vistāravat yan netraṃ nayanaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_33: tasya parivartanaṃ kaṭākṣīkaraṇaṃ sa eva vibhramo vilāsaḥ / mūrttyā samāropitanāyikāvyavahārayā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_34: utkalikās taraṅgā ruhiruhikāś ca hṛdayaṃ madhyadeśāś cittaṃ ca / ārohārtha iti āroḍhum
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_35: iti pūrvaślokabhāgagataḥ / hṛdayārthaś ceti / hṛdayam ambunidher ity atra sthitiḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_36: tayor iti āroho jīvavyāpāraviśeṣaḥ / hṛdayaṃ jīvakāyaikadeśaviśeṣaḥ / alaṅkārāntaratvam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_37: iti sādṛśyāl lakṣaṇā vakroktir ityādiprakāreṇa / lākṣaṇikahṛdayādiśabdaprayoge svaśabdaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_38: vināpy arthāntaraṃ pratīyata ity āha yadartheti / yatropameye 'mbunidhiprabhṛtau /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_39: yadarthaikāśrayo nāyakādirūpopamānaviṣayo dharmo hṛdayādir āropito lakṣaṇayā bhavet,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_40: tayor nāyakāder upamānasyāmbunidhyādeś copameyasyopamānopameyabhāvaḥ śābdo neṣyate /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_41: gamyamānas tv iṣṭa evety arthaḥ / atraiva aparāgetyādinā śābdatve doṣodāharaṇam āha /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_42: mūlāny amātyādiprakṛtivargaḥ vṛkṣāvabandhanāni ca unmūlayituṃ sukara iti yojanā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_43: tad dhīti upamānopameyatvam / rūpakaṃ yatheti / tasyopamā rūpakaṃ vā ity anusaṃdhatte /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_44: anurāgo lauhityam api / apiśabdaḥ sukhādipadanikaṭe yojanīyaḥ / vasuśabdas tejodhanayoḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_45: atra niṣkāsanam utkaṭatvena gaṇikādharmo rūpakasya sādhakaḥ pramāṇam / kāryataś ceti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_46: kāryam atra niṣkāsanam / tadviśeṣasya strītvaviśeṣasya gaṇikārūpasyeti / ubhayārtheti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_47: dvyarthapadaprayogaḥ pāṇḍupayodhareṇa ityādau / liṅgaviśeṣaḥ śarad raveḥ ityādau /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_48: guṇavṛtti padam āroḍhuṃ hṛdayam ityādau / upamānaviśeṣo yathā ārdranakhakṣatābham
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_49: ityādau / ākrośo gālidānam / paryāyoktīti yena rāhustrīstanayoḥ kārkaśyalakṣmīr vṛthā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_50: kṛtety anena bhaṅgyantareṇa rāhoḥ śiraśchedaḥ prakāśita iti tatsādhanam asādhāraṇaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_51: cakraṃ pratīyata evety arthaḥ / padādīti padādigatānām akṣarāṇām anuprāso gumphabhaṅgī
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_52: darśayan kavīnām atyantavallabha ity arthaḥ / kalabhāṣiṇīti / atra kamalekṣaṇe ity
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_53: arthānuguṇaḥ pāṭhaḥ / anyathānuprāsahevākitaiva syāt / śatrur eva śātrava iti prajñāditvāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_54: svārthe 'ṇ / tadrūpaṇam eveti upamāpekṣayā rūpakasya gamyamānaupamyatvāt prayogārhatve
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_55: 'pi sāmarthyāvagatarūpatvād yatrābhidhānaṃ punar uktaṃ tatropamāyāṃ paunaruktye kā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_56: śaṅkā iti / ivaśabdasyeti mūrcchita iva mūrcchayatīty arthapratīteḥ siddhatvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_57: viṣādisaṃparkād dhi mohaṃ prāptaḥ parān api mohayatīti prasiddham / ayaṃ mandadyutir
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_58: iti nidarśanāyāṃ mamevety arthāt pratītaṃ na punar upāttam / mumūrccheti prasasārety
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_59: arthaḥ / bādhakasadbhāvābhāva iti / anena yatraikasyaiva viśeṣaṇasyopamānopameyasaṃbandhabādhakam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:176_60: asti tatra pṛthakprayoge 'pi na doṣaḥ, yathā -
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_0: ityādau prativastūpamāyām ity āha / atra hīvādiśabdābhāve sati vākyabhedaḥ / prākaraṇikatvopamānopameyabhāvapratītau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_1: sādharaṇadharmasya pṛthakprayogam antareṇa vākyārthasaṅgatir na bhavatīti pṛthak
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_2: prayogo na duṣṭaḥ / tadvacanam iti sahajapadena svābhāvikatvavacanam / tulyavibhaktīnām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_3: arthāt upamānopameyānām / eṣā nirdhāraṇe ṣaṣṭhī / etanmadhye ekasyety arthaḥ / paryāyair
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_4: iti / svābhāvikapadādiṣu kṛteṣu sahajapadādibhiḥ / samāsāntarapadāśrayaṇeneti umā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_5: ca mā ca umāme / tayoḥ dhavāv ityādi dvandvapūrvakatatpuruṣāśrayeṇety arthaḥ / chāyānihatapadayor
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_6: iti prathamaṃ chāyāśabdaḥ dvitīyaś nihataśabdaḥ kartavyaḥ syād iti dārṣṭāntikakrameṇaiva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_7: dṛṣṭāntāv uktau / astv iti chāyānihataśabdayoḥ prayogaḥ / ubhayor apīti / dvandvapūrvakasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_8: bahuvrīher bahuvrīhipūrvakasya vā dvandvasyety arthaḥ / etac ca dṛṣṭāntagatatvenoktam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_9: api dārṣṭāntikagatatvenāpi paryavasānaṃ neyam / dārṣṭāntike hītthaṃ yojanā / tatpuruṣapūrvasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_10: dvandvasya dvandvapūrvasya vā tatpuruṣasya lakṣaṇānugamaḥ saṃbhavatīti / tadarthatvād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_11: ity uktaṃ vidheyāvimarśavicāre / yāvadbhir iti padair ity arthāt / tatpuruṣalakṣaṇāśrayeṇeti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_12: prakṛte dvandvalakṣaṇapūrvakatvaṃ jñeyam / evaṃ na dvandvalakṣaṇam ity atra tatpuruṣalakṣaṇapūrvakatvaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_13: boddhavyam / tasyeti dvandvasya / atajjātīya iti yatra tatpuruṣaśaṅkā nāstīti pārvatīparameśvarāv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_14: ity atrāpi parameśvarapade karmadhārayāśrayaṇadarśanena tatpuruṣapūrvakatvaṃ yojanīyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_15: avāntaracintayeti paunaruktyaprastāve samāsacintayety arthaḥ / atra mādhavaśabdasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_16: yaugikatve 'pi samṃjñātvena nrūḍher umāmādhavāv iti prayoge umāyā mādhavasya ca spṛṣṭatvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_17: pratītir na tu dvandvapūrvakatatpuruṣārthasyeti dvandvalakṣaṇaṃ nātīva hṛdayaṅgamam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_18: ity āhuḥ / rekhā hīti rekhā maryādā avadhiḥ sīmeti paryāyāḥ / tatra heyapakṣapratikṣepeṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_19: prayogo yathā saṃsāreti / atra saṃsārasaṃbhavasya nirākaraṇam iti heyasya pratikṣepaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_20: upādeyaparigraho yathā tvaṣṭur iti / atra saṃpadaḥ prasaro vistāra ity upādeyasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_21: parigrahaḥ / indūdayasyeva saṃnibhā yasyeti atra saṃnibhāśabdaḥ prabhāparyāyo vyākhyātaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:179_22: yathā tu dāṇḍo granthas tathā saṃnibhaśabdaḥ sadṛśaparyāyo 'sti tad uktam -
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_0: iti / tadanusāreṇendūdayena sadṛśa indūdayasaṃnibha iti vyākhyeyam / taduktyaiveti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_1: avahitatvoktyety arthaḥ / mūḍhacetana iti mūḍhadhiya iti ca mohanāmno mūḍhatvasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_2: buddhidharmatvāt cetanadhīśabdayoḥ paunaruktyam / tatsaṃbandhāt tadavagatir iti cetanasaṃbandhāc
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_3: caitanyāvagatir ity arthaḥ / kṛpāmṛdur iti / kṛpā cetanadharma iti caitanyavācipadaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_4: na kṛtam / evaṃ mūḍhāḥ mūḍhaḥ ity atrāpi vācyam / uditavapuṣīti paunaruktyam evānusaṃdhatte /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_5: manaḥkartṛkatvaṃ pramodaḥ kriyākaraṇaśabdayor iti atra gauḥ śābaleya itivac chokakriyāśabdayoḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_6: sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvena prayogaḥ / granthakṛtas tu viśeṣasyaivopayogāt sāmānyāvyabhicārāc
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_7: ca kriyāśabdasya vaiyarthyam karaṇaśabdasya kriyāvācitvān niṣphalatvam iti śokaśabda
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_8: eva karttavya ity abhiprāyaḥ / anubhavaviśeṣātmatvopagama iti saugataprakriyayaitad
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_9: uktam / vaiśeṣikās tu jaḍam evātmaguṇam ekārthasamavāyinā jñānena grāhyaṃ sukham
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_10: āhuḥ / tatprakriyāyāṃ kartavyam evānubhavagrahaṇam / ekasyeti sāgarasya / itarasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_11: ceti uttārārthasya / tadrūpatāvagater ity ubhayatra vācyam / madirādraveti / atra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_12: samābhātīty ekaṃ padaṃ gaṇitam upasargāṇāṃ dyotyapāratantryeṇa pṛthakpadārhatvābhāvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_13: ekādiprayoge satīti ekasya prayogābhyupagame 'nyeṣām eva tattvam / tatrāpy ekatvam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_14: aniyatam / evaṃ dvayos trayāṇām ityādiyojanā kāryā, tatrāpy aniyatatvena prakārabahutvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_15: avivekaprayuktam iti / yady apy avimṛśyakāritvasyaivāpatkaraṇatvaṃ, tathāpy avivekasyāvimṛśyakāritvaprayojakatvāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_16: tasya kāraṇatve 'py avimṛśyakāritvam eva kāraṇam uktaṃ bhavati / na hīti yasmin sati
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_17: vahnau dhūma ityādike pratibandhakālabhāviny anvaye sati viśeṣaṇasya yasya asati
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_18: vahnau na dhūma ityādivyatirekasya gatiḥ pratītiḥ, tasyānvayasya sa eva vyatireko
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_19: hetur yuktaḥ vayavasthitasya hetuhetumadbhāvasya vaiparītyaprasaṅgāt / anvayapratītihetuko
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_20: hi vyatirekapratītyupakramo na tu viparyayaḥ / viśeṣaṇāc ceti guṇalubdhā iti sādhāraṇatvād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_21: ity arthaḥ / sāmarthyeti / dvividhaṃ paunaruktyam arthagataṃ śabdagataṃ ceti / tatrārthasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_22: sāmarthyasiddhatve 'rthagataṃ gauṇam āmukhe paunaruktyānavabhāsāt / śabdagatam āsukhāvabhāsamānatvād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_24: iti vyastasamastatvena yojyam / evaṃ prakṛteḥ pratyayasya cety atrāpi vācyam / anyathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_25: prāṅnirdiṣṭasya pañcavidhasya paunaruktyasyāsaṅgrahaḥ syāt / vihitasyeti / vastuvṛttyā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_26: sthitasya bahuvrīher yā karmadhārayaśaṅkā tayā matvarthīyādiḥ śabdaḥ kṛto bisakisalayacchedapātheyavanta
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_27: ityādau / tasya sphuṭaṃ paunaruktyaṃ vṛttidvayasya gauravāt / yasminn iti jāmbavapallavādaunītyādau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_28: yasmin pallavaśabda ity arthaḥ / arthaḥ yatra + tyalakṣaṇo yattaddhitotpattiḥ yasmād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_29: aṇpratyayākhyāt taddhitād utpattiḥ pratītiviṣayatvāpattir yasyārthasya / tadantas
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_30: taddhitapratyayānto jāmbavaśabdādiḥ / tenaiva pallavaśabdena na samasanīyaḥ, jambūpallavānīti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_31: samāsena gatatvāt taddhitavaiyarthyaprasaṅgāt / viśeṣaṇavaśād iti / pinākapāṇyādiviśeṣaṇamāhātmyāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_32: viśiṣṭam utkarṣāpakarṣavantaṃ saṃjñinaṃ harādikaṃ yatrecchet na tatra paunaruktyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_33: anyathā tu paunaruktyam / yathā pāyāt sa śītakiraṇābharaṇo bhavo vaḥ ityādau / sakṛd
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_34: eveti sāmyābhidhāyī ivaśabdādiḥ / niryāya vidyetyādau / yadvad iti dṛṣṭāntamukhena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_35: janair ajātaskhalanair ityādi saṅgṛhītam / arthasyeti rāhustrīratanayor ityādau /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_36: yadvaśād iti tajjigīrṣur ivetyādau / athavā yatra kārakaviśeṣavaśāt kriyāyāḥ pratītiḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_37: kriyāviśeṣavaśād vā kārakasya, tatra kriyākārakayoḥ prayogo na kārya ity ayam arthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_38: yathā mā bhavantam ityādau / yo yaddharmeti aparadiggaṇiketyādau yo diglakṣaṇo 'rtho
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_39: yaddharmasya gaṇikādharmasya niṣkāsanāder upacāreṇopalakṣitaḥ / tathā ambunidher
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_40: mamanthe ityādau yasya kāmukasya saṃbandhaṃ yad hṛdayādi tetyanānvito 'mbudhilakṣaṇo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_41: yaś cārthaḥ, tasya tadrūpaṇād gaṇikākāmukarūpaṇāt na śābdī / neṣyate / ārthī punar
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_42: iṣyata eva / prayuktāntargatair eveti madirādravetyādau / kartari iti pradhānabhūte
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_43: rājādau kartari / tatkriyāyāṃ ca khaḍgena cchadakriyāyāṃ rūḍhāyāṃ sādhakatamasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_44: khaḍgasya yāni bahūni tadapekṣayāṅgāni dhārāvinipātādīni teṣāṃ vāg vacanaṃ neṣyate
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_45: yathā karakalitetyādau / etad uktaṃ bhavati / rājādau karttari cchedādikriyāyāṃ yat
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_46: sādhakatamaṃ khaḍgādyaṅgaṃ tasyāpy aṅgānāṃ dhārāvinipātādīnāṃ vacanaṃ neṣyate tenaivāṅgena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_47: pradhānabhūtenāvāntarāṅgānām apy ākṣepād / doṣadvayaṃ prayukteti karttari iti ca
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_48: pratipāditam / te iti samāsāḥ / vṛttāv iti / samāse vākye vā asādhāraṇaṃ yatra viśeṣaṇaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_49: tatra viśeṣyaṃ na vācyaṃ yathā duḥkhānubhavetyādau / yo yadātmeti bāṣpāder jalādirūpatvāvyabhicārāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_50: prayojanābhāve jalādipadaprayogā na kārya ity arthaḥ / yathā nayane bāṣpavāriṇetyādau /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_51: yo yasyeti yo niṣyandanādiḥ yasya candrakāntāder dharmiṇo 'vyabhicārī dharmaḥ tayoḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_52: samāso na praśasyate, yathā dviṣadvadhūlocanetyādau / anyathā iti / sādharmyārtha
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_53: ity arthaḥ / kriyeti kriyāyāḥ śokādilakṣaṇāyāḥ pratītiḥ karaṇapratītiṃ na vyabhicarati
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_54: karaṇam eva yataḥ kriyā / tadapratītau karaṇāpratītau saiva śokādilakṣaṇā kriyā na
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_55: niścitā syād ekatvāt / tyāgakriyety atraitad eva kriyāśabdapravṛttinimittam / tat
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_56: tasmāt / tayadvaśāt śokādiśabdaprayogavaśād yasya karaṇasya vyaktiḥ prakāśas taduktau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_57: śākādiśabdaprayoge tat karaṇādivat padaṃ na prayuñjītety arthaḥ, yathā śokakriyākaraṇasyetyādau /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_58: prayukte ceti prakṛtyādipaunaruktyānāṃ caturṇām upasaṃhāraḥ / anyonyeti vākyapaunaruktyasaṃgrahaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:181_59: ubhayor uktir ekasya ubhayamadhyāt kasya cit / paunaruktyaṃ nātikrāmati / yathā sahasā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:182_0: evaṃ paunaruktyaṃ saprapañcaṃ vicārya vācyāvacanaṃ prapañcayitum āha - vācyasyāvacanaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:182_1: yatheti / asamāsena nirdeśo vakṣyamāṇam etatsamānanyāyam avācyasya vacanam api kaṭākṣayitum /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:182_2: idamā parāmarśa iti abādhitapratyakṣanimittatvād bhrāntinivṛtteḥ pratyakṣasya ca
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:182_3: viṣayamukhena parāmarśārhatvāt / tasya yat svaśabdena vacanam iti pūrvaṃ saty eva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_0: iti punaruktam uktam / idānīṃ tu sarvanāmasthanīyatvena svaśabdena vacanaṃ vācyāvacanam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_1: ucyate / dharmidharmeti dharmī haralakṣaṇo 'rthaḥ / dharmaḥ kapālasaṃbandhena garhitatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_2: ubhayaṃ dharmidharmātmakam / viśeṣapratipattaya iti garhitatvam atra viśeṣaḥ / tasyeti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_3: garhitatvasya / evaṃ tasya vivakṣitety atra jñeyam / vivakṣito 'rthaḥ śocyatālakṣaṇaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_4: ārtha iti viśeṣaṇadvāreṇa bhāvāt / vāmalocanātvam iti / na cātra vāmalocaneti viśeṣyapadam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_6: pratītiḥ / viśeṣaṇam evātra vāmalocanāpadam / tṛtīya iti ubhayavṛttitvākhyaḥ / na
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_7: cāsāv iti āvṛttiḥ / na caiṣām iti tenaiva tatparyāyeṇa sarvanāmnā cety eṣāṃ prakārāṇām /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_8: alpadoṣatvād iti / tasyeti vyavahitasaṃbandhāt kiṃ cid utkṛṣṭatvam / tasya samāgamaprārthanayeti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_9: vācyam / arthabhedād iti / ayam arthaḥ ekasyāsakṛdvṛttā sarvā vāvṛttiḥ, yathā daridrāṇāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_10: bhojane kāṃsyapātryāḥ / tad uktam - āvṛttir asakṛdvṛttiḥ iti / na cārthabhede śabdasyaikatvaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_11: nyāyyam arthabhedasya pradhānabhūtasya guṇabhūtaṃ śabdaṃ prati bhedakatvam tvāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_12: tasmād atra dvayoḥ śabdayor vastuvṛttena yat sādṛśyaṃ yaś ca sādṛśyahetukaḥ pratipattṛṛṇām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_13: ekatābhramaḥ, tannibandhano 'yaṃ mukhya evāvṛttivyavahāra iti / ataś ceti / yata
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_14: āvṛttir na yujyate, tata ity arthaḥ / dharmidharmobhayātmakam iti / ubhayamaye vastuni
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_15: pratipatsita ity arthaḥ / yatrānyasyetyādinā / vācyāvacanodāharaṇaprasaṅgena śleṣaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_16: guṇadoṣavattayā vitataṃ vicārayati / alakālīti / alakāny evāḷikulam alakasadṛśaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_17: cālikulam / chado 'dharaḥ patrāṇi ca / āmodaḥ praharṣaḥ saurabhaṃ ca / karṇikā karṇābharaṇaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_18: bījakośaś ca / na śleṣasyeti / nanu śleṣaprastāve kaḥ prasaṅgo 'bjasyopamānacarcāyām /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_20: śleṣa evātra nyāyyo nopamety abhiprāyaḥ / ata eva śleṣe tu tasya vācyatayety uktam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_21: nibandha iti nibadhnantīti nirdiṣṭaḥ / tatsāmyaṃ rajjvādisāmyam / na śleṣasyeti upamāśleṣasyety
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_22: arthaḥ / tena rajjvādipratipādakaṃ guṇā iveti na vācyam / nanu viśeṣaṇasāmyanibandhanā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_23: samāsoktir na ca nibadhnantīti viśeṣaṇam ity āha na hi viśeṣaṇasāmyam eveti / etac
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_24: cāsmābhir harṣacaritavārtike nirṇītam iti tata evāvadhāryam / pṛthak tam upādāyeti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_25: tacchabdena śaśī parāmṛṣṭaḥ / sa hy ārtha eveti upamānopameyabhāvaḥ / śleṣaviṣaye
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_26: iti / atra tisraḥ kakṣyāḥ / rājaśabdasyobhayārthatvāc śleṣaḥ / tadanāśrayaṇenendunā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_27: rūpaṇaṃ tatpṛṣṭhe cendur ivety upamā / nanu rājendur ity atra tūpamārūpakayor ekaparigrahe
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_28: sādhakabādhakābhāvāt saṅkaro nyāyyaḥ, na niyamena rūpakam / tat katham uktaṃ rūpakam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_29: āsūtritam iti / ucyate / prakramyamāṇopamābhiprāyāt paunaruktyabhayena rūpakam āśritam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_30: upamāyā abhāve tu saṅkara evātra yuktaḥ / yad vopamāpekṣayā rūpakasyātra samāse sphuṭatvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_31: pratīte rūpakaṃ saṃśritam / anenaiva hy abhiprāyeṇa vakṣyati rūpakasya viṣaye upamāyā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:185_32: yatheti / tābhyāṃ spardhitum iti / rūpakaṃ śleṣarūpakābhyām / tayor yathāpūrvam iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_0: nanv evaṃ satīti / asya doṣasyātiprasaṅgaṃ brūte / tāpa ātapo 'pi / phalaṃ śālyādikam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_1: api / sumanasaḥ puṣpāṇy api / khalatā durjanatvaṃ, dhānyādikṣodanasthānaṃ ca / asatī
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_2: dūṣaṇīyā aśobhanā ca / yadalaṅkāreti / khalatām ityādāv upamotthāpite śleṣe nopamā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_3: śleṣaṃ bādhate / tasya viviktaviṣaytvābhāvāt / śleṣas tu tām bādhate iti yuktam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_4: asya nyāyasyālaṅkārāntare 'pi bhāvād vyāptigarbham uktaṃ yad alaṅkāreti / nibandhanāntarābhāve
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_5: iti / sati samāsoktyādinibandhane pūrvavat śleṣottāpitopamā na kartavyā syāt / na
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_6: cātrānirākṛtetyādiviśeṣaṇasāmyāt samāsoktir iti vācyam / viśeṣaṇānāṃ niyatopamānagāmitvāpratīteḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_7: atra viṣayatāśaṅkaiveti upamāviṣayatvasaṃbhāvanety arthaḥ / kva cit tu tada[tadv]iṣayateti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_8: pāṭhaḥ / tatra śleṣaviṣayatvam upamāviṣayatvaṃ ca yugapan na śaṅkanīyaṃ tayor utsargāpavādedabhāve
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_9: na vyavasthiter ity arthaḥ / uktadoṣadvayeti / uktaṃ yac śleṣaviṣaye doṣadvayaṃ -
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_10: yatra samāsoktiviṣaye śleṣaḥ kṛtaḥ śleṣaviṣaye copameti, tasyātra saṃbandhābhāvād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_11: ity arthaḥ / yadalaṅkāreti / śleṣopamādīnām alaṅkārāṇām abhivyaktyarthaṃ ye śabdā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_12: abjam ivetyādayaḥ tebhyo 'laṅkārebhya itaraḥ samāsoktiśleṣādiḥ tair eva śabdaiḥ alpatarair
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_13: abjam ivetyādirahitair yadi vyajyeta tadāsau samāsoktiśleṣādir laghutvād grāhyo,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_14: nāparaḥ śleṣopamādir ity arthaḥ / nanu śobhātiśayahetutvam alaṅkārāntarāṇāṃ lakṣaṇam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_15: tad viśeṣyate / tat katham idam uktam ity āha - na hy astīti / śobhātiśayajanane
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_16: nije vyāpāre nāsty alaṅkārāṇāṃ viśeṣaḥ / tataś caiko gṛhyate 'paras tyajyata iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_17: na yuktam / gurulaghutvam āśritya punar yujyata etan nānyatheti tātparyam / vācyātiśayāpekṣayā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_18: caitad uktam pratīyamānatvāpekṣayā tu samanantaraṃ viśeṣo vakṣyate / kiṃ cetyādinā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_19: kāvyakriyāyāṃ saundaryaniṣpatteḥ prayojakatvam alaṅkāraniṣpatteś ca anuniṣpāditaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_20: yathā vaktā vedanācāmayoḥ ity āha / samāsoktiśleṣabhaṅgibhyām eveti / samāsoktyā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_21: tu alakālītyādau / śleṣeṇa bhairavācārya ityādau / nopameyeti / alakālītyādāv upamā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_22: śleṣopamā / bhairavācārya ityādau upamaivopamā / atra samāsoktiśleṣabhaṅgibhyām eva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_23: ity etadgranthānusāreṇa rūpakasya viṣaye upamāyā yathetyādigranthaḥ prakṣipta iva
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_24: lakṣyate / rūpakasyehānupasaṃhārād, uktadoṣadvayayogāsiddheḥ ity asya ca pūrvoktagranthasyātra
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_25: pakṣe nyūnatvād ataś caivāyaṃ kva cid ādarśe na paṭhyate / aprakṣepe tu trirūpakagrahaṇam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_26: iha kartvyaṃ syāt / tasmāt sa vā grantho nivārya iha vā rūpakagrahaṇaṃ prakṣepyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_27: uktadoṣadvayeti ca prakṛtaucityena vyākhyātam / te hi tatsiddhīti / rasabandhasiddhāv
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_28: alaṅkārā avaśyaṃ sidhyantīty arthaḥ / niṣpādakatvam ihānmāpakatvam / ata eva bharate
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_29: rasaniṣpattir ity atra rasānumitir iti vyākhyeyam / tadvaicitryaṃ vibhāvādivaicitryam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_30: tadāśrayāḥ paraṃparayā rasāśrayā rasajñaptihetava ity arthaḥ / tenaiṣām iti / kaver
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_31: arthagataṃ cārutvaṃ tātparyeṇa saṃpādyaṃ, nālaṅkāropanibandhaḥ alaṅkārāṇāṃ tannāntarīyakatvenāprādhānyāt /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_32: ataś cārutvaṃ yathā niṣpadyate tathā teṣām upanibandhaḥ kāryaḥ / tatprayojanāc cādhānoddharaṇādaya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_33: ity arthaḥ / nānvahādhānoddharaṇādaya ity uktyā alaṅkārāṇāṃ parasparaṃ cārutvaniṣpādane
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_34: viśeṣaḥ pratipāditaḥ / pūrvaṃ ca na hy asti nije ityādinā viśeṣābhāva uktaḥ / tat
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_35: kathaṃ na virodhaḥ / naitat / pūrvam avavadhānena cārutvaniṣpādanaṃ manasikṛtya viśeṣābhāvaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:186_36: pratipāditaḥ / iha tu vibhāvādyupakaraṇatvena gurulaghutvādinā viśeṣa ukta ity apekṣābhedā[n
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_0: kaiś cid iti vāmanaprabhṛtibhiḥ / adhunā yat pratijñāmātreṇa pratipāditaṃ yathā śabdasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_1: śaktyantarābhāvād vyañjakatvaṃ na saṃbhavati iti tadvācyāvacanodāharaṇatvopayogi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_2: śleṣaprasaṅgenopapādayitum āsūtrayati - sa cāyam iti / yas samāsoktiviṣaye kṛto yasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_3: ca viṣaye upamā kṛtā sa ity arthaḥ / dvividha iti vakṣyamāṇasyobhayaśleṣasyātraivāntarbhāvaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_4: ābhyām eva samuccitābhyāṃ tasyotthāpanāt / yatrānyūneti yatra viśeṣyasya viśeṣaṇaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_5: na nyūnībhavati nāpy atiricyate, tatra śleṣaḥ / mātragrahaṇaṃ liṅgavacanānāṃ bhedād
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_7: kriyārūpo yatra pradhānabhūto 'rthaḥ śleṣeṇa svarūpahāniṃ nīyate, na tatra śleṣo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_8: niravadya ity arthaḥ / tasya ca dharmapratipādakaśabdaviṣayatvena dharmipratipādakaśabdaviṣayatvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_9: ca dvaividhyam / ubhayapratipādakaśabdaviṣayatvaṃ tu dūṣayiṣyate / aparas tv iti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_10: arthaśleṣaḥ / ubhayatrāpi śabdaśleṣe 'rthaśleṣe ca / yāvad ivādi nibandhanaṃ nāśritaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_11: tāvad arthāntaram apramāṇakam eveti śleṣābhivyaktyarthaṃ nibandhanam āśrayaṇīyam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_12: atrāntare iti phullamallikābhir dhavalā ye 'ṭṭās tripuracatuṣpuramahāprakārā āpaṇā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_13: vā tair vikāso hāso yasya tadvac ca dhavalāṭṭahāso yasya / kusumasamayayugaṃ māsadvayaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_14: ramyatvena tatsadṛśa ca yugaṃ kṛtādim upasaṃharan ajṛmbhata vikasitavān vyaktānanaś
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_15: cābhūd mahākālo dīrghasamayaḥ saṃhartṛdevatāviśeṣaś ca / samāsoktīti / mahākāla ity
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_16: atra mahāsamaya ity aśliṣṭe viśeṣyapade prayukte viśeṣaṇasāmyād eva devatāviśeṣapratīteḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_17: samāsoktir bhavantī mahākālaśabdasyāvṛttau pramāṇam / na cātra mahākālaśabde prayukte
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_18: prayāsaḥ kaś cit / yena alakālikuletivat samāsoktyā śleṣasya vaiyarthyaṃ śaṅkyeta /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_19: ācchāditeti / parvatapakṣe ācchāditaṃ vaipulyād diśaś cāmbaram ākāśaṃ ca yena, uccakair
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_20: ucyatāṃ gāṃ bhūmiṃ cākramya vartamānaṃ, mahārohapariṇāhāni śṛṅgāṇi śikharāṇi yasya,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_21: tadaucityāc ca śirasi sphurac candralekham, evaṃvidhaṃ nageśaṃ parvatarājaṃ dṛṣṭvā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_22: ko na vismito bhavatīty arthaḥ / harapakṣe tu ācchāditaṃ paridhānīkṛta diśa eva asya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_23: nava vastraṃ yena, tathā u[k]taṃ sthūlaviṣāṇa ca vṛṣabham adhiruhya sthitaṃ, mastake
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_24: candrakalānvitaṃ ca nageśa kailāsādhipatiṃ sākṣātkṛtya anugṛhītammanyatvena ko na
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_25: vismayata ity arthaḥ / śveto dhāvatītivad iti śabdatantram / pradīpavad iti punar
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_26: arthatantram / yathāyogam iti tulyapradhānatvena sādhāraṇyaṃ tantram / atulyapradhānatvena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_27: tu prasaṅgaḥ / tayoḥ pratipattir iti / kiṃ cit khalu vastuśaktyaiva kāryakāri yathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_28: dīpādi / kiṃ cit tu parāmarśāpekṣaṃ yathā dhūmādi liṅgam / yatra yasmin viṣaye parāmarśanairapekṣyeṇa
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_29: vastuśaktyaivobhayakāritvaṃ tatra tantrādi nānyatra / śabdaḥ parāmarśāpekṣo 'rthapratītikārī /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_30: parāmarśo na nirnibandhana iti nātra tantrādipravṛttiḥ / ahāryaḥ parvataḥ / sahakāritā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_31: saha karaṇaśīlatva sahakārasaṃbandhaś ca / anavamā utkṛṣṭāḥ / navaḥ pratyagraḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:187_32: mādhavo vasantaḥ / ramyatātireketi sahakārasaṃbandharūpa ity arthaḥ / tasya vācyasyeti /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_0: samayasmṛtiḥ saṅketasmaraṇam / asiddham ekatvam iti / tataś ca nāyaṃ tantrāder viṣayaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_1: tattvam ekatvam / avyayānavyayātmakam iti / avyayam ivādi / anavyayaṃ sadṛśādi /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_2: dharmārthasyeti / śleṣād abhinnatvam iti yojyam / prakaṭeti / kulayaś caṭakāḥ tad
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_3: uktam - kuliḥ kuliṅgaś caṭakaḥ iti / te ca te śakuntāḥ śakunayaḥ teṣāṃ cakreṇa samūhena
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_4: bhāsvatīnāṃ valabhīnāṃ hitāḥ anurūpā mattavāraṇāḥ aṅkaḥ cihnaṃ yasyāḥ / niśānto 'ntaḥpuram /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_5: viḍambayantī uapahasantī / samarabhūpakṣe kuliśaṃ vajraṃ / kuntāḥ prāsāḥ / cakrāṇi
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_6: arīṇi / tair bhāsvadbhiḥ / vyatireko viḍambayantīti prakāśitaḥ / prakaṭetyādau ca
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_7: viśeṣaṇabhāge 'tra śleṣaḥ / uṣasīti / andhakāra eva malinatvāt paṅkaḥ / tasya vigalitasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_8: plavo 'navasthānaṃ tena śabalaṃ vicitram / ghanavartma viyat / dūram atyartham /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_9: madhuraḥ sukumāro yas taraṇitāpo raviprabhā tadyogena tāraṃ hṛdyam / madhupāyino
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_10: bhramarās teṣāṃ paṅktiḥ / andhakārapaṅkaplava eva vigalanena nissāratvāc chavaḥ tasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_11: laṅghanena vartmasu pakṣmasu dūramā aramaṇīyaśrīḥ / madhuratā makarandāsaktā tathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_12: raṇitā saśabdā, yad vā madhuratena makarandāsaṅgena raṇitaṃ guñjitaṃ yasyāḥ / payogatā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_13: jalagatā / aram atyartham / atra ghanavartmaśabdasyopameyavācinaḥ śleṣe 'ntarbhāvāt
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_15: anavarataṃ nayanasalilena sicyamāno vṛddhiṃ nīyamānaḥ / tathā anavarataṃ nayanaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_16: prāpaṇaṃ yasya tena salilena sicyamāna ārdratvaṃ prāpyamāṇaḥ / vipado lavaḥ sūkṣmabhāgo
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_17: vipallavo vigatakisalayaś ca / prarohati vistīrṇībhavati aṅkurāṃś ca muñcati dharmāṃś
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_18: ca muñcati dharmārthatvam iti / kila atra sthitam api dharmārthatvaṃ nopamānaviśeṣaṇatvāyālaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_19: viśeṣaṇatvasya kakṣyāntarabhāvitvāt / na cāvṛttim antareṇa kakṣyāntaraparigraho nyāyyaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_20: na cātrāvṛttiḥ kāryā / pramāṇābhāvāt / anāvṛttau tu tasyām eva kakṣyāyāṃ viśeṣaṇatve
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_21: upameyasvarūpāpahāraprasaṅga iti padārthaḥ / tasyopameyeti tacchabdena vipallavaśabdaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_22: parāmṛṣṭaḥ / yaḥ punar iti śleṣaprayojakaḥ śabdaḥ / apradhānaṃ viśeṣaṇabhūtam / pradhānasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_23: hi pūrvoktanyāyenāvṛttir nyāyyā / nibandhanam ivādi / sānuparvatasya mālabhūbhāgaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_24: aṅkollākhyās taravaḥ teṣāṃ pallavā bhāsvanto yatra / aṅkollaśabdaḥ prākṛtabhāṣāpadam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_25: api kavibhir atiprasiddhyā śleṣādiṣu prayujyate / tathā ca sakuśāṅkollapallavā /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_26: maithilīva śriyaṃ dhatte iti parimalena prayutam / saṃskṛte punar aṅkoṭhaśabdaḥ sthitaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_27: tathā bhāsvān aṅke ullapan mukharaḥ lavākhyaḥ putro yatreti sāmānyenānyapadārtho
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_28: gṛhyate / iheti vipallavaśabde / ivādyavyayam iti / tarur iveti prayuktasyevaśabdasyānyathā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_30: iti / yataḥ tena padena saṃbhavadapradhānārthenāpi pradhānabhūto 'rthaḥ saṃspṛṣṭaḥ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_32: dvirupādānam avaśyaṃ kāryam, tatra daṇḍāpūpikayā tadekārthasya pradhānamātrārthasya
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_33: śabdasya dvirupādānaṃ nyāyasiddham eva / rucir dīptiḥ abhilāṣaś ca ruciḥ / atra dvau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_34: ruciśabdau viśeṣyavācitvāt pradhānārthau / nanūpamānasya yadi viśeṣyatvaṃ nopameyaviśeṣaṇatvaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_35: tat katham upameyasaṃbandhiny upamānasya vibhaktiḥ yathā vāgarthāv iva saṃpṛktau
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_36: iti / naiṣa doṣaḥ / viśeṣaṇatvam avacchedakatvaṃ tac copamānasyopameyaṃ praty upamitikriyāyāṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_37: vidyata eva / anyathā tayoḥ saṃbandhābhāvād ananvyaprasaṅgaḥ / sthite viśeṣaṇatve
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_38: tasya na viśeṣyavibhakter hāniḥ kā cit / yat punar ihopamānaśabdasya viśeṣyavācitvam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_39: uktaṃ tad dharmitābhiprāyeṇa / dharmī hy upamānam / na ca svatantratvāt viśeṣyārthaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_40: ataś caivāyaṃ strīva gacchati ṣaṇḍo 'yam ity upameyaliṅgaṃ na bhajate / dharmavāci
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_41: tu viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyaliṅgam eva / tad uktam - guṇavacanānām āśrayato liṅgavacanāni
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_42: bhavanti iti / tad evam upamānam upameyavibhaktiṃ na na bhajate dharmitvaṃ ca na
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_43: jahātīti / khalatā durjanatvam / khalatā ākāśavallī / atra prayukta iti / tarur ivety
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_44: atra / vākyabhedaprasaṅgād iti saṃbhavaty ekavākyatve vākyabhedaś ca neṣyate iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_45: vākyabhedasya pratipattigauravavattvād dheyatvam / atha samāsoktīti / anavaratajaletyāder
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_47: gamyamānatvaṃ tatra samāsoktiḥ, na sākṣād upādāna ity arthaḥ / kva cid iti / babhravaḥ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_48: kapilāḥ / etad dāvāgniviśeṣaṇaṃ san nakulalakṣaṇam arthaṃ pratipādayatīti dharmidharmobhayātmatvam /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_49: evaṃ hariṇā haritā mṛgāś ca / jaṭā mūlāni keśasaṃniveśāś ca / valkalaṃ vṛkṣatvak
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:188_50: tatkṛtaṃ ca vāsaḥ / kapilāḥ piṅgalā muniviśeṣāś ca / āropaviṣayabahutvād āropyamānānām
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:189_0: kesariṇaṃ bakulapuṣpavantaṃ siṃhaṃ ca / vasantaṃ mādhavaṃ nivasantaṃ ca / abhimāno
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:189_1: dhārādhirūḍho māno mahāpramāṇaś ca / durvāraṇo 'śakyavāraṇo duṣṭaś ca karī / matto
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:189_2: matsakāśāt samadaś ca / abhimāna iti na tathā hṛdayaṅgamaḥ pāṭhaḥ / anyonyam iti
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:189_3: vasantam ity asya kesariṇam iti viśeṣaṇaṃ, siṃhapakṣe ca kesariṇam ity asya vasantam
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:189_4: iti / rūpyeti yaḥ kesarī pratītaḥ sa vasantasya rūpakatvena na tāṭasthyena / evaṃ
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:189_5: vasantam ity asya nivasanārthayoge 'pi vasantārthaḥ kesariṇo rūpakatvena yojanīyaḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:189_6: ittham eva durvāraṇābhimānayor vācyam / viśeṣyatvena rūpyatvena ca svatantratvaṃ,
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:189_8: gṛhyate / tilakas taruviśeṣas tilakaś ca viśeṣakaḥ / tadabhivyaktir ubhayārthābhivyaktiḥ /
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:189_9: tayor ubhayor arthayoḥ / guṇavanto rajjuyuktā api ghaṭakāḥ saṅghaṭayitāro hrasvāś
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:189_10: ca ghaṭāḥ / pārthivā rājānaḥ, na tu vakṣyamāṇayuktyā pṛthivīvikārā vyākhyeyāḥ guṇavattvaghaṭakatvayor
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:189_11: iti / yady apy atra samīhitasiddhau hetutvena vyavasthitasya ghaṭakā ity asya pārthivā
GK16ruvyavivya_pu:189_12: iti prati viśeṣaṇatvaṃ, tathāpi kūpa ivety upamāsāmarthyād viśeṣyatvam api ghaṭate //
